story:
At the moment our world is being challenged by war, health epidemics, natural disasters and poverty– each one leaving behind thousands of children who have seen and experienced unimaginable emotional suffering. 

Picture from Dumyé workshop held in Syrian refugee camp in Lebanon

We’ve spent the last year and half working with hundreds of these orphaned and vulnerable children, through our doll making workshops, offering them an opportunity to experience joy, relief through creative expression, self-reflection, process some of what they have been through and most importantly, control one piece of their world. Each of the workshops were made possible through the sales of our hand-crafted, personalizable, limited edition cloth dolls.

Picture of Dumyé 's hand-crafted, personalized, limited edition cloth dolls

However, we would like to give the MILLIONS of children orphaned around the world an opportunity to benefit from our program. To do so, we've thoughtfully packaged our art workshops into a DIY DOLL KIT that makes giving back more accessible and fun for everyone! You can now design a Dumyé doll of your own and for each kit purchased we gift a doll to an orphan in need, through one of our doll making workshops. Together we can bring love and light to not only our children but also the children who have not been spoken for.


Introducing the DIY DOLL KIT

Inspired by the art workshops we conduct with orphans, the (Do It Yourself) DIY DOLL KIT taps into the power of your child’s innate creative spirit while raising their social consciousness. Oh, and it’s super fun too! 

Children live in a world where they're 'smallest in command'. However through pretend play, especially with a smaller human form (aka doll), children have the opportunity to be in charge and permission to explore behavior and concepts that would otherwise be considered unacceptable. A child's most natural form of communication is in art and play - both things the DIY DOLL KIT capitalizes on.

Through our DIY DOLL KIT, children will have the opportunity to hone skills such as: 

  • hand-eye coordination
  • fine motor
  • design
  • creative thinking
  • visualization
  • problem solving
  • perseverance

But what makes the DIY Doll Kit so incredibly special is what it represents, the impact it makes and the beautiful opportunity to share those values with your children through the process.

  • Giving back is life's greatest gift. For each DIY DOLL KIT purchased an orphan in need will be gifted a doll too.
  • These dolls are made with Fair Trade Organic cotton - meaning they respect both humanity and our mother earth because there is no joy in succeeding at the misfortune of others.
  • The dolls are stitched together by an NGO in one of the poorest states of India, economically empowering these women and in turn, they use their proceeds to educate the next generation of girls in their community. So cool, right?! 


So Whats Inside The Cute Little Cardboard Suitcase Anyway?

Well it depends on which DIY DOLL KIT you choose but one thing is for sure... your kids are going to love it. If you're familiar with Dumyé then you know that our passion for giving is only rivaled by our passion for design. Our DIY DOLL KIT's are no exception. We have sourced some beautiful materials for you.


Each DIY Doll Kit comes with:

  • 1 x a-dorable, re-usable, kraft suitcase - great for keeping all those craft supplies tidy.
  • 1 x blank stuffed, Fair Trade organic cotton doll (approx. 40 cm tall) - with the Dumyé signature Purpose Pocket™. This a special pocket on the backside of the doll, holding a blank piece of cloth, waiting to keep a meaningful message or great big dream safely tucked away.
  • 8 x non-toxic permanent fabric marker colors (blue, orange, yellow, purple, pink, green, red, black)
  • 3 x unique natural cotton fabrics, each 20 x 40 cm 
  • 1 x matching wool roving 'knot'
  • 1 x skien of matching cotton thread
  • 2 x matching felt pieces made of 100%, BPA free, post consumer plastic 
  • 1 x workbook with coloring activity, basic sewing instructions, sample clothing patterns and doll design inspiration to get the juices flowing
  • 2 x sewing needles in a pouch
  • 1 x surprise accessory ( paper flowers / pom poms / wooden beads)

How It All Began

“DESIGN HAS THE POWER TO SHAPE OUR WORLD FOR THE BETTER.” - Sahar Wahbeh, Founder Dumyé

The story of Dumyé begins after this designer became a mother to an enchanting little girl. It was the holidays and Sahar Wahbeh, wanted to gift her daughter a really special doll – a toy that would hopefully one day become synonymous with her daughter’s childhood. She, searched high and low for such a doll but found nothing that captured her little girl’s spirit or her own heart. Wherever she looked, she found dolls that did not represent the values or the aesthetic she was seeking. Inspiration struck and after a trip to NYC’s garment district the idea began to form. Sahar dusted off her mother’s vintage sewing machine, made a workspace out of an old ping pong table and got to it.

However, Dumyé didn't come to fruition until Sahar saw the opportunity to use the dolls as a way to not only share her values with her daughter but to actually live by them. Things like respecting Mother Nature, so Dumyé dolls are made with a mixture of organic, sustainable and mostly natural materials. Things like, having compassion for our fellow (wo)men, which is why we commission an NGO in one of the poorest states of India to handle elements of our production. This allows us to empower the women in their community to be self sufficient, while they use their proceeds to educate the next generation of girls. Things like, knowing in our hearts that the real gift in life is in the giving. So for every doll that we sell we gift a doll to one of the approximately 136 million (UNICEF 2008) children orphaned around the world.

Dumyé began as a living lesson to Sahar's daughter, but it has become a lesson to children living in more than 15 countries spanning the globe and is responsible for hundreds of orphans receiving meaningful dolls of their own.  

Ultimately, it’s Dumyé's hope, that when our generation passes the reigns to our children, we’ll be leaving them to a world better then the one we were born to.


People Have Been Talking...



The Perks

$25     DUMYÉ TOTE

You're understated, compassionate, nurturing and stylish... This Dumyé branded jute tote is the perfect accessory for you! No matter where you go with your new bag, the beach, grocery store, park you will carry with you our sincerest gratitude and a message of hope. 

Best of all this bag was made by an organization providing dignified economic opportunity to women and education for girls, in rural India. You are not only supporting Dumyé, you are supporting them as well. Thank you ♥

$50   GIFT A DOLL TO AN ORPHAN + TOTE

So you love what Dumyé does and want to support both us and the little people we help. But you don't want anything in return - just that warm feeling hugging your heart when you know you've done something selfless and kind. You got it, but we are still going to send you a Dumyé Tote as a token of our gratitude! Thank you ♥ 

Best of all, thanks to your pledge an orphan in need will be gifted a doll to laugh with, play with and dream with. Dolls With Purpose®

$68   DIY DOLL KIT 

Inspired by the workshops we conduct with orphans, the DIY Doll Kit taps into the power of your child’s innate creative spirit while raising their social consciousness. Oh, and it’s super fun! 

Your choice of DIY DOLL KIT - Sunday's Rose, Bold Blossom, Talking Heads

Best of all, thanks to your pledge an orphan in need will be a gifted a doll to laugh with, play with and dream with. Dolls With Purpose® Thank you ♥ 

$98   PETITE DUMYÉ

• INDIEGOGO EXCLUSIVE PRE-LAUNCH OF NEW COLLECTION • 

Our hand-crafted Petite Dumyé dolls make for the sweetest companion. You get to personalize the way they look too! (body hair) YOU will be the first to own Sweetie Pie, Pop OR Star Light, as they are part of our newest collection. 

They stand at 35 cm and are hand-crafted with a mixture of organic, sustainable and natural materials. They feature our signature hand embroidered rose bud mouth and Purpose Pocket. (Psst... a Purpose Pocket is a special place on the back of the doll, with a blank piece of cloth where you can write a meaningful message.)They come packaged in a Dumyé branded organic cloth bag.

Once we are ready to make your doll we will send you an email asking you which doll you would like and how you would like her to be personalized.

Best of all, thanks to your pledge an orphan in need will be a gifted a doll to laugh with, play with and dream with. Dolls With Purpose® Thank you ♥ 

$150   2 X DIY DOLL KITS + TOTE

2 DIY DOLL KITS... because sharing the fun IS more fun! And a Dumyé Tote for you!

Your choice of 2 DIY DOLL KITS - Sunday's Rose, Bold Blossom, Talking Heads

Best of all, thanks to your pledge 2 orphans in need will be a gifted a doll to laugh with, play with and dream with. Dolls With Purpose® Thank you ♥ 

$168   LIMITED EDITION DUMYÉ
• INDIEGOGO EXCLUSIVE PRE-LAUNCH OF NEW COLLECTION •

Our Limited Edition Dumyé dolls are where our journey began. Each one is personalized by you (body, hair, eyes), cut to order and part of a numbered, limited edition collection. You're welcome to select one of the following dolls: Gigi, Henry, Talula, Little Foot OR Rocky.

They stand at 50 cm and are hand-crafted with a mixture of organic, sustainable and natural materials. They feature our signature hand embroidered rose bud mouth, almond eyes and Purpose Pocket. They come packaged in a Dumyé branded organic cloth bag.

Once we are ready to make your doll we will send you an email asking you which doll you would like and how you would like it to be personalized.

Best of all, thanks to your pledge an orphan in need will be a gifted a doll to laugh with, play with and dream with. Dolls With Purpose® ♥ 

{Free Shipping}

$498   DIY DOLL KIT PARTY 

• SAVINGS $46 • 

What better way to celebrate then to have a doll making party?! 8 DIY DOLL KITS (of your choice) + 8 of your besties = TONS OF MEANINGFUL FUN. AKA - Tapping into your children's creative spirit and raising their social consciousness. 

Psst momma... entertainment and goody bag are now sorted. 

Your choice of 8 DIY DOLL KITS - Sunday's Rose, Bold Blossom, Talking Heads

Best of all, thanks to your pledge 8 orphans in need will be a gifted a doll to laugh with, play with and dream with. Dolls With Purpose® Thank you ♥ 

{Shipping Within UAE $20 / International $80}

$998   BIRTHDAY / CLASSROOM WORKSHOP 

What better way to celebrate then to have a doll making party?! A beautiful selection of craft supplies + 24 of your besties = TONS OF MEANINGFUL FUN. AKA - Tapping into your childern's creative spirit and raising their social consciousness. Great for schools and clubs too. Here's what is included:

  • 24 x blank stuffed, Fair Trade organic cotton doll (approx. 40 cm tall) - with the Dumyé signature Purpose Pocket™. This a special pocket on the backside of the doll, holding a blank piece of cloth, waiting to keep a meaningful message or great big dream safely tucked away.
  • 24 x Fair Trade organic cotton branded Dumyé cloth bags
  • 24 x workbooks with coloring activity, basic sewing instructions, sample clothing patterns and doll design inspiration to get the juices flowing
  • 72 x pieces of cotton fabric, each 20 x 40 cm each
  • 24 x matching cotton thread
  • 24 x matching wool roving 'knots'
  • 48 x felt pieces made of 100%, BPA free, post consumer plastic (raven, wheat, chestnut)
  • 28 x  non-toxic permanent fabric markers (blue, orange, yellow, purple, pink, green, red, black) 
  • 36 x sewing needles in pouches

Psst momma... entertainment and goody bag are now sorted.

Best of all, thanks to your pledge 24 orphans in need will be a gifted a doll to laugh with, play with and dream with. Dolls With Purpose® Thank you ♥ 

$5,000   GRAB YOUR PASSPORT 

... Because you're going to need it! We invite you to join us on our next giving trip, somewhere in the world, to not only see the good work we do but to actually experience it. 

Best of all, you get to deliver your pledge of 100 dolls, into the hands of 100 orphans, to laugh, play and dream with. Just wait until you see their faces! Dolls With Purpose® Thank you ♥ 

{Hotel and Food included - must be 18+ with a valid passport}

$10,000   ORGANIZATIONAL PARTNERSHIP 

If your organization has a giving heart and looking for a powerful way to unleash it... this is for you! We will gift up to 300 dolls to 300 orphaned and vulnerable children in your honor. You can choose the orphanage (as long as it is in a safe place for us to travel) and you're welcome to bring your employees along to volunteer. This will be an experience never to be forgotten! 

Best of all, thanks to your purchase 300 orphans in need will be gifted a doll to laugh with, play with and dream with. Dolls With Purpose® Thank you ♥


Karmic Goodness™

 Karmic Goodness is the positive ripple created when you purchase a doll from Dumyé. 

Dumyé customer with her limited edition Harvest doll #MyDumye

Let's start with the child you purchased a Dumyé doll for... They receive a personal and meaningful gift, that they will cherish for many years to come. But there's more, because they will know that a child, far away and far less fortunate, will also have the opportunity to create a doll - thanks to your purchase. Raising our youths social consciousness is important because they are our future world leaders. Let's get them off to a good start.

Orphaned Syrian Refugee in a Dumyé workshop

Let's shift focus to the orphan who receives a doll, because of your purchase, through our doll making workshops. This offers them an opportunity to experience joy, relief through creative expression, self-reflection, process some of what they have been through and most importantly, control one piece of their world. Under the Convention on the Rights of a Child, UNICEF declared that it is every child's human right to have access to 'play, and to join in a wide range of cultural, artistic and other recreational activities.' (Article 31) Your purchase enables us to provide that for an orphaned or vulnerable child, helping to restore their childhood.

Partner NGO in Anupshahar, India

Next we want to talk about our commitment to supporting women. We currently partner with an NGO in one of the poorest states of India, allowing us to support economic opportunity for women and in turn they use their proceeds to educate the next generation of girls in their community. All statistics prove that when women succeed, economies and communities flourish.  

Lastly, our impact on the earth... All of our dolls are made with a mixture of organic, sustainable and natural materials. We only have one Mother Earth, so let's work together to preserve it.

FAQ

Q1: Who are DIY Doll Kits meant for?

We designed them for children 5 - 100 years old - boys and girls alike.

Q2: Who are your Petite Dumyé & Limited Edition Dumyé dolls meant for?

We designed them for children 3+ years old but let's be honest... you are never too old to have a beautiful doll!

Q3: Why do you need our help to bring the DIY Doll Kit to market?

Up until this point we have made the dolls we sell in our small Dubai studio. However producing these DIY Doll Kits requires us to work with various manufacturers who have minimums... ours is 5,000! We need your help to fund the production.

Q4: Why can't I add more than one 'perk' to my contribution?

We have gotten quite a few emails about this. Unfortunately, Indiegogo only allows you to check out with one perk at a time. If you would like to 'purchase' more than one perk, you will have to check out with each one separately. We apologies for the inconvenience but appreciate your support!

Q5: How do I choose and personalize my Limited Edition or Petite Dumyé doll?

Once we are ready to make your special doll, we will be in touch to find out which doll you would like specifically and how you would like it personalized. Easy peasy.

Q6: OMG I love what your doing. Tell me how else I can help!

Thank you for asking! 

  • Use the social share buttons to share our campaign and story with your friends
  • Join our Dumyé Insider email list here
  • Follow us on social media: facebook,instagram, twitter, pinterest

Q7: What does Dumyé mean?

It was inspired by the Arabic word for doll 'doomya'.

Q8: Are you an Non-Profit Organization?

No, we are not. We are a for-profit company with a giving heart. ♥

Q9: Where can I learn more?

Head over to www.Dumye.com to learn more and check out the rest of our collection.
story_txt:
At the moment our world is being challenged by war, health epidemics, natural disasters and poverty– each one leaving behind thousands of children who have seen and experienced unimaginable emotional suffering. 


Picture from Dumyé workshop held in Syrian refugee camp in Lebanon
We’ve spent the last year and half working with hundreds of these orphaned and vulnerable children, through our doll making workshops, offering them an opportunity to experience joy, relief through creative expression, self-reflection, process some of what they have been through and most importantly, control one piece of their world. Each of the workshops were made possible through the sales of our hand-crafted, personalizable, limited edition cloth dolls.


Picture of Dumyé 's hand-crafted, personalized, limited edition cloth dolls
However, we would like to give the MILLIONS of children orphaned around the world an opportunity to benefit from our program. To do so, we've thoughtfully packaged our art workshops into a DIY DOLL KIT that makes giving back more accessible and fun for everyone! You can now design a Dumyé doll of your own and for each kit purchased we gift a doll to an orphan in need, through one of our doll making workshops. Together we can bring love and light to not only our children but also the children who have not been spoken for.


Introducing the DIY DOLL KIT



Inspired by the art workshops we conduct with orphans, the (Do It Yourself) DIY DOLL KIT taps into the power of your child’s innate creative spirit while raising
their social consciousness. Oh, and it’s super fun too! 
Children live in a world where they're 'smallest in command'. However through pretend play, especially with a smaller human form (aka doll), children have the opportunity to be in charge and permission to explore behavior and concepts that would otherwise be considered unacceptable. A child's most natural form of communication is in art and play - both things the DIY DOLL KIT capitalizes on.
Through our DIY DOLL KIT, children will have the opportunity to hone skills such as: 



hand-eye coordination

fine motor
design
creative thinking
visualization

problem solving
perseverance

But what makes the DIY Doll Kit so incredibly special is what it represents, the impact it makes and the beautiful opportunity to share those values with your children through the process.


Giving back is life's greatest gift. For each DIY DOLL KIT purchased an orphan in need will be gifted a doll too.
These dolls are made with Fair Trade Organic cotton - meaning they respect both humanity and our mother earth because there is no joy in succeeding at the misfortune of others.
The dolls are stitched together by an NGO in one of the poorest states of India, economically empowering these women and in turn, they use their proceeds to educate the next generation of girls in their community. So cool, right?! 


So Whats Inside The Cute Little Cardboard Suitcase Anyway?
Well it depends on which DIY DOLL KIT you choose but one thing is for sure... your kids are going to love it. If you're familiar with Dumyé then you know that our passion for giving is only rivaled by our passion for design. Our DIY DOLL KIT's are no exception. We have sourced some beautiful materials for you.





Each DIY Doll Kit comes with:

1 x a-dorable, re-usable, kraft suitcase - great for keeping all those craft supplies tidy.
1 x blank stuffed, Fair Trade organic cotton doll (approx. 40 cm tall) - with the Dumyé signature Purpose Pocket™. This a special pocket on the backside of the doll, holding a blank piece of cloth, waiting to keep a meaningful message or great big dream safely tucked away.
8 x non-toxic permanent fabric marker colors (blue, orange, yellow, purple, pink, green, red, black)
3 x unique natural cotton fabrics, each 20 x 40 cm 
1 x matching wool roving 'knot'
1 x skien of matching cotton thread
2 x matching felt pieces made of 100%, BPA free, post consumer plastic 
1 x workbook with coloring activity, basic sewing instructions, sample clothing patterns and doll design inspiration to get the juices flowing
2 x sewing needles in a pouch
1 x surprise accessory ( paper flowers / pom poms / wooden beads)



How It All Began



“DESIGN HAS THE POWER TO SHAPE OUR WORLD FOR THE BETTER.” - Sahar Wahbeh, Founder Dumyé

The story of Dumyé begins after this designer became a mother to an enchanting little girl. It was the holidays and Sahar Wahbeh, wanted to gift her daughter a really special doll – a toy that would hopefully one day become synonymous with her daughter’s childhood. She, searched high and low for such a doll but found nothing that captured her little girl’s spirit or her own heart. Wherever she looked, she found dolls that did not represent the values or the aesthetic she was seeking. Inspiration struck and after a trip to NYC’s garment district the idea began to form. Sahar dusted off her mother’s vintage sewing machine, made a workspace out of an old ping pong table and got to it.
However, Dumyé didn't come to fruition until Sahar saw the opportunity to use the dolls as a way to not only share her values with her daughter but to actually live by them. Things like respecting Mother Nature, so Dumyé dolls are made with a mixture of organic, sustainable and mostly natural materials. Things like, having compassion for our fellow (wo)men, which is why we commission an NGO in one of the poorest states of India to handle elements of our production. This allows us to empower the women in their community to be self sufficient, while they use their proceeds to educate the next generation of girls. Things like, knowing in our hearts that the real gift in life is in the giving. So for every doll that we sell we gift a doll to one of the approximately 136 million (UNICEF 2008) children orphaned around the world.
Dumyé began as a living lesson to Sahar's daughter, but it has become a lesson to children living in more than 15 countries spanning the globe and is responsible for hundreds of orphans receiving meaningful dolls of their own.  
Ultimately, it’s Dumyé's hope, that when our generation passes the reigns to our children, we’ll be leaving them to a world better then the one we were born to.



People Have Been Talking...












The Perks


$25     DUMYÉ TOTE
You're understated, compassionate, nurturing and stylish... This Dumyé branded jute tote is the perfect accessory for you! No matter where you go with your new bag, the beach, grocery store, park you will carry with you our sincerest gratitude and a message of hope. 
Best of all this bag was made by an organization providing dignified economic opportunity to women and education for girls, in rural India. You are not only supporting Dumyé, you are supporting them as well. Thank you ♥






$50   GIFT A DOLL TO AN ORPHAN + TOTE

So you love what Dumyé does and want to support both us and the little people we help. But you don't want anything in return - just that warm feeling hugging your heart when you know you've done something selfless and kind. You got it, but we are still going to send you a Dumyé Tote as a token of our gratitude! Thank you ♥ 
Best of all, thanks to your pledge an orphan in need will be gifted a doll to laugh with, play with and dream with. Dolls With Purpose®





$68   DIY DOLL KIT 
Inspired by the workshops we conduct with orphans, the DIY Doll Kit taps into the power of your child’s innate creative spirit while raising their social consciousness. Oh, and it’s super fun! 
Your choice of DIY DOLL KIT - Sunday's Rose, Bold Blossom, Talking Heads
Best of all, thanks to your pledge an orphan in need will be a gifted a doll to laugh with, play with and dream with. Dolls With Purpose® Thank you ♥ 





$98   PETITE DUMYÉ• INDIEGOGO EXCLUSIVE PRE-LAUNCH OF NEW COLLECTION • 
Our hand-crafted Petite Dumyé dolls make for the sweetest companion. You get to personalize the way they look too! (body hair) YOU will be the first to own Sweetie Pie, Pop OR Star Light, as they are part of our newest collection. 
They stand at 35 cm and are hand-crafted with a mixture of organic, sustainable and natural materials. They feature our signature hand embroidered rose bud mouth and Purpose Pocket. (Psst... a Purpose Pocket is a special place on the back of the doll, with a blank piece of cloth where you can write a meaningful message.)They come packaged in a Dumyé branded organic cloth bag.
Once we are ready to make your doll we will send you an email asking you which doll you would like and how you would like her to be personalized.
Best of all, thanks to your pledge an orphan in need will be a gifted a doll to laugh with, play with and dream with. Dolls With Purpose® Thank you ♥ 

$150   2 X DIY DOLL KITS + TOTE
2 DIY DOLL KITS... because sharing the fun IS more fun! And a Dumyé Tote for you!
Your choice of 2 DIY DOLL KITS - Sunday's Rose, Bold Blossom, Talking Heads
Best of all, thanks to your pledge 2 orphans in need will be a gifted a doll to laugh with, play with and dream with. Dolls With Purpose® Thank you ♥ 







$168   LIMITED EDITION DUMYÉ• INDIEGOGO EXCLUSIVE PRE-LAUNCH OF NEW COLLECTION •

Our Limited Edition Dumyé dolls are where our journey began. Each one is personalized by you (body, hair, eyes), cut to order and part of a numbered, limited edition collection. You're welcome to select one of the following dolls: Gigi, Henry, Talula, Little Foot OR Rocky.
They stand at 50 cm and are hand-crafted with a mixture of organic, sustainable and natural materials. They feature our signature hand embroidered rose bud mouth, almond eyes and Purpose Pocket. They come packaged in a Dumyé branded organic cloth bag.
Once we are ready to make your doll we will send you an email asking you which doll you would like and how you would like it to be personalized.
Best of all, thanks to your pledge an orphan in need will be a gifted a doll to laugh with, play with and dream with. Dolls With Purpose® ♥ 
{Free Shipping}

$498   DIY DOLL KIT PARTY 
• SAVINGS $46 • What better way to celebrate then to have a doll making party?! 8 DIY DOLL KITS (of your choice) + 8 of your besties = TONS OF MEANINGFUL FUN. AKA - Tapping into your children's creative spirit and raising their social consciousness. 
Psst momma... entertainment and goody bag are now sorted. 
Your choice of 8 DIY DOLL KITS - Sunday's Rose, Bold Blossom, Talking Heads
Best of all, thanks to your pledge 8 orphans in need will be a gifted a doll to laugh with, play with and dream with. Dolls With Purpose® Thank you ♥ 
{Shipping Within UAE $20 / International $80}

$998   BIRTHDAY / CLASSROOM WORKSHOP 
What better way to celebrate then to have a doll making party?! A beautiful selection of craft supplies + 24 of your besties = TONS OF MEANINGFUL FUN. AKA - Tapping into your childern's creative spirit and raising their social consciousness. Great for schools and clubs too. Here's what is included:

24 x blank stuffed, Fair Trade organic cotton doll (approx. 40 cm tall) - with the Dumyé signature Purpose Pocket™. This a special pocket on the backside of the doll, holding a blank piece of cloth, waiting to keep a meaningful message or great big dream safely tucked away.
24 x Fair Trade organic cotton branded Dumyé cloth bags
24 x workbooks with coloring activity, basic sewing instructions, sample clothing patterns and doll design inspiration to get the juices flowing
72 x pieces of cotton fabric, each 20 x 40 cm each
24 x matching cotton thread
24 x matching wool roving 'knots'
48 x felt pieces made of 100%, BPA free, post consumer plastic (raven, wheat, chestnut)
28 x  non-toxic permanent fabric markers (blue, orange, yellow, purple, pink, green, red, black) 
36 x sewing needles in pouches

Psst momma... entertainment and goody bag are now sorted.
Best of all, thanks to your pledge 24 orphans in need will be a gifted a doll to laugh with, play with and dream with. Dolls With Purpose® Thank you ♥ 

$5,000   GRAB YOUR PASSPORT 
... Because you're going to need it! We invite you to join us on our next giving trip, somewhere in the world, to not only see the good work we do but to actually experience it. 
Best of all, you get to deliver your pledge of 100 dolls, into the hands of 100 orphans, to laugh, play and dream with. Just wait until you see their faces! Dolls With Purpose® Thank you ♥ 
{Hotel and Food included - must be 18+ with a valid passport}

$10,000   ORGANIZATIONAL PARTNERSHIP 
If your organization has a giving heart and looking for a powerful way to unleash it... this is for you! We will gift up to 300 dolls to 300 orphaned and vulnerable children in your honor. You can choose the orphanage (as long as it is in a safe place for us to travel) and you're welcome to bring your employees along to volunteer. This will be an experience never to be forgotten! 
Best of all, thanks to your purchase 300 orphans in need will be gifted a doll to laugh with, play with and dream with. Dolls With Purpose® Thank you ♥


Karmic Goodness™







 Karmic Goodness is the positive ripple created when you purchase a doll from Dumyé. 



Dumyé customer with her limited edition Harvest doll #MyDumye

Let's start with the child you purchased a Dumyé doll for... They receive a personal and meaningful gift, that they will cherish for many years to come. But there's more, because they will know that a child, far away and far less fortunate, will also have the opportunity to create a doll - thanks to your purchase. Raising our youths social consciousness is important because they are our future world leaders. Let's get them off to a good start.

This offers them an opportunity to experience joy, relief through creative expression, self-reflection, process some of what they have been through and most importantly, control one piece of their world. story:
The sisters of Alpha Phi are excited to inform you about our seventh annual Mr. Greek philanthropy event, hosted by ourselves and the brothers of Tau Kappa Epsilon on the 11th of April. The event will consist of a male beauty pageant, featuring Maryland Greek Fraternity brothers who will compete against each other to win the title of the ultimate “Mr. Greek.” 

All of the proceeds from this event will go to Alpha Phi's national philanthropy, The Alpha Phi Foundation. This benefits sisters in need, scholarship, and Women's Heart Health. Tau Kappa Epsilon will be donating to The PG County Ward. This trauma unit has personally helped a brother in need, and does amazing work in the College Park area. 

We would very much appreciate any donation large or small, any amount helps! Thank you so much for supporting us and supporting our amazing community!

story:
Why do we even have this campaign?

  • Our everyday names are Dean and Bill, but our company name is BlueRed Ventures. Blue as in Democrat and Red as in Republican.
  • We have vastly different opinions on politics, social issues and world events, yet here we are.....building a company TOGETHER and solving problems for EVERYONE.
  • Help us launch our first product to show that people with differences can work together to create better solutions.

What exactly do we need?

Well, we've come this far, but now we need your help. The Sidekick product surveys have been positive, the patent is in process and the prototypes have been tested. We are at a critical point and must manufacture more of the product. Your generosity will provide:

  1. An engineer to complete the design, so the mold for the product can be built.
  2. The funds to buy a two cavity mold based on the final design from bullet #1, which means we can start making the product for YOU faster and with higher quality.
  3. The money needed to purchase the product material  and pay for the first runs of the machine using the mold from bullet #2.

Why should you help?

This is our first product. It is not one and done. We want to build a company that brings new and innovative ideas to EVERYONE. The world is becoming smaller, but the divide is growing. Again, we want to prove that people with different views can come together as humans and solve problems. Our differences should not separate us. They should unite us to create better solutions for everyone.

Looking for a way to help besides funding?

We realize some of you may not be comfortable giving two strangers your hard earned money. That's totally understandable and we get it. We ask that you let us know what you think of the product by emailing us. And, please share our page with others if you like the product! Just use the Indiegogo share tools.

Thank you for listening!

story:
My story

Situated in one of the little countries in the world, i feel that I am strategically at an advantage because i'm a blogger living in Sri Lanka. I started my journey as a freelancer about 4 years from now. I've had a very difficult phase which was full of struggle and disappointments.

I started my blog at www.blogmost.com against the wish of my parents with hope that i would be able to make my mark somewhere in the long run. My struggle did not end here because keeping the blog running was a higher responsibility than before. But i was ready for any thing that life throws my way.

I slowly started delving deep into the world of internet, blogging and SEO. Internet started inspiring and kept on becoming more determined by every passing day. I wrote all of my experiences in form of some tutorials for the people to benefit from and the response has been good, in fact, better than i had expected initially.

I became convinced about the fact that i really can make a difference by using my pen. My blog grew into a large reservoir of information to cater to all kinds of people over the internet.

I built many services like SEO assistance, Blog building, traffic flow enhancement, blog development, social media integration back-linking processes.

I also covered many genres like Business, money making, education, health, entertainment, movies, blogging, gaming platforms, electronics, gadgets, reviews, home and gardening, pets, parenting, relationships and family.

So far, the result is that my website has grown to a stage where i currently get more than 20,000+ global visitors monthly. Unfortunately, i do not have enough funds in order to propagate my website towards expansion. Hence, the growth and development of my website has stalled and I am trying not to lose hope by every passing day.

I am standing at a critical stage where it will be my downfall if i am unable to do something about it. The hard work that i have invested into the website could be very fruitful and rewarding for all in the future only if could keep it going with some help from others.

I am fully equipped with knowledge and skills but the only factor which is holding me from contributing more to the community is the lack of funds.

My website acting as the propagation channel, i want to be able to reach out to people and the different communities around the world. I have had a great response till now based on the useful knowledge that i have imparted to thousands of people but it should not end here.

I want to reach out to a larger group around the world and i believe that this cannot be done without a helping hand as this is entirely a community effort.

One should not feel that they would not get anything in return of helping me out because i have plenty of perks in store for you. In fact, i will be giving much more in return than i receive here.

It is going to be a mutual and community effort, by the community, for the community.


Current scenario

My website has been fairly progressing till date. There had been enough traffic and a good number of visitors each day. But surely, it requires a considerable amount of regular investment before a website becomes self-sufficient and start rolling and reaping benefits on its own.

Due to lack of resources and funds, I am unable to keep the progress going forward. I have the right kind of skills and knowledge that  are required in order to maintain and develop a blogging portal but it surely requires more than that.

I am really looking forward to some investors and contributors who can be a part of this process. You can expect some amazing perks and offers in return in terms of many services that are listed on my website. You are going to be a part of it, so rest assured.

You will be granted full access to my domain and you will be able to experience each and every detail as we progress together. All the funds will be used entirely in making our portal a better place for the members of the community that will be visiting it to gain benefits.

A good response is pretty much assured from my website because it already has a good number of traffic and the main obstacle of launching it has already been crossed and left behind. My work is already in existence and i have created a great number of followers and supporters in the mean time when i had been struggling hard.

The large number of visitors on my website and the followers on my various social media portals is a clear indicator of the fact that there should not be any problem in the future. Hence, success and the right kind of development is very much ensured in the future when we have enough amount of funds in order to carry the work forward.

The Developing Plan

We currently are in need of funds as there are several things that need to be taken care of in order to let the development and progress of the website be done in a periodic way and in an efficient manner. We have thoroughly investigated the current scenario and have done considerable amount of research in the market and on the world wide web so that we can exactly know where we currently stand, what is to be done and what are the estimated costs, time and deadlines associated with it.

We have allocated and broken down the amount of funds required in the following sections:

Developmental Overhaul of the entire structural design and Framework: - $1500

We have realized the need for change. Dynamic nature is always important because change is the only entity which we are synonymous to.

The templates and the structures of the website will need to be re-constructed in order to have an enhanced user appeal and more accessibility by the users. An efficient User Interface and be a major factor in the long run as it is something that can improve the user experience as it guides and facilitates the user in reaching out to where they exactly want to.

These changes might seem to be small at first but they contribute in a big way later on as we will see.

The Design Makeover: - $1500

The layout and design of a website should be built in such a way that it pleases to they senses of the audience and they actually enjoying browsing around on your website. A badly or poorly designed website can be a huge turn off for the audiences as it shows and conveys a lot about the dedication that the owner has put into it.

More than half of the work is done if the appearance and appeal of the website is satisfactory.

The specialized SEO campaign: - $4000

Every portal requires some means in order to be existent and findable over the world wide web. The internet is flooding and is full of websites and resources related to almost every thing that a person can imagine.

So, how does your audience search for something in one of the search engines and find your links? This is where the Search Engine Optimization techniques kick in. This is a very vast and complex topic in itself because usually it is not so simple to attract traffic and audience to your website.

There are many ways and techniques by the use of which one can improve the ranks of their websites and we too need to do the same so that people can reach out to us first instead of wandering somewhere else.

This is a very rigorous process and requires a considerable amount of time and dedication in order to be successful. Proper kinds of SEO techniques for a website can be a blessing for the prospects of the website in the future.

Advertising, Expansion and Marketing in the Social Media: - $3000

Nowadays, any franchise or brand is incomplete without the participation of Social Media. Establishments from the biggest to the smallest always require the support of the Social Media at some point of time.

Social Media is a very crucial part of this long going ordeal as it is one of the best methods to reach out to the people. The social media and the social networks are the ultimate pool of traffic. There reside all the users from different parts of the world. It is only up to us that how exactly will we be able to let them know about our website.

Advertising is a very important part of any campaign as it is the only medium by the use of which the audience comes to know about us.

The power of Social Media is so great that it is unfathomable. It alone can lead a portal to victory with ease.

Expansion leads to the multiplication of processes on the servers. A larger community means more traffic and more activities which is very healthy and desirable for every domain.

Every entity and establishment depends largely on the marketing that has been done for it. Every brand invests a large amount of funds and efforts in marketing just to get recognition in the market because this is important.

Hence, the conclusion is that these attributes are very essential for every website and we too aim to do the same.

B L O G M O S T       P E R K S 

BRONZE SUPPORTER - $5
Thank you very much for your Big support on be half of BLOGMOST.
We send you a BIG Thank you for the Great support you given for us.


SILVER SUPPORTER - $10

Blogmost is one of the Great website to have a Backlink for you.

Yes as the Silver supporter..you will have a Lifetime Contributor membership account for Guest posting

N.B. Please be kind enough to follow our posting guidelines.


GOLD SUPPORTER - $100 [LIMITED OFFER]

As the Biggest supporter we will place your banner advertisement on Blogmost Homepage (336*280 Banner)

Thank you very much  for the Great support..!




The Verdict

The future is well planned and the website has been going on the right track till now. It just needs a push in terms of funding so that the necessary details and changes can be added to the website along with the tools and techniques which allow more and more traffic to be attracted to our portal.

This cannot be done without the support from other people. Please become a part of our community and let us work towards a better future for us together.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some of you just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help us.

  • Please share campaign through Facebook,Twitter & other social media platforms.
  • Remind your friends to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

Thank you Very much..!
story_txt:
My story
Situated in one of the little countries in the
world, i feel that I am strategically at an advantage because i'm a blogger
living in Sri Lanka. I started my journey as a freelancer about 4 years from
now. I've had a very difficult phase which was full of struggle and
disappointments.
I started my blog at www.blogmost.com against the wish
of my parents with hope that i would be able to make my mark somewhere in the
long run. My struggle did not end here because keeping the blog running was a
higher responsibility than before. But i was ready for any thing that life
throws my way.
I slowly started delving deep into the world of internet,
blogging and SEO. Internet started inspiring and kept on becoming more
determined by every passing day. I wrote all of my experiences in form of some
tutorials for the people to benefit from and the response has been good, in
fact, better than i had expected initially.
I became convinced about the fact that i really can make a
difference by using my pen. My blog grew into a large reservoir of information
to cater to all kinds of people over the internet.
I built many services like SEO assistance, Blog building,
traffic flow enhancement, blog development, social media integration
back-linking processes.
I also covered many genres like Business, money making,
education, health, entertainment, movies, blogging, gaming platforms,
electronics, gadgets, reviews, home and gardening, pets, parenting,
relationships and family.
So far, the result is that my website has grown to a stage
where i currently get more than 20,000+ global visitors monthly. Unfortunately,
i do not have enough funds in order to propagate my website towards expansion.
Hence, the growth and development of my website has stalled and I am trying not
to lose hope by every passing day.
I am standing at a critical stage where it will be my
downfall if i am unable to do something about it. The hard work that i have
invested into the website could be very fruitful and rewarding for all in the
future only if could keep it going with some help from others.
I am fully equipped with knowledge and skills but the only
factor which is holding me from contributing more to the community is the lack
of funds.
My website acting as the propagation channel, i want to be
able to reach out to people and the different communities around the world. I
have had a great response till now based on the useful knowledge that i have
imparted to thousands of people but it should not end here.
I want to reach out to a larger group around the world and i
believe that this cannot be done without a helping hand as this is entirely a
community effort.
One should not feel that they would not get anything in
return of helping me out because i have plenty of perks in store for you. In
fact, i will be giving much more in return than i receive here.
It is going to be a mutual and community effort, by the community,
for the community.
Current scenario

My website has been fairly progressing till date. There had
been enough traffic and a good number of visitors each day. But surely, it
requires a considerable amount of regular investment before a website becomes
self-sufficient and start rolling and reaping benefits on its own.
Due to lack of resources and funds, I am unable to keep the
progress going forward. I have the right kind of skills and knowledge that  are required in order to maintain and develop
a blogging portal but it surely requires more than that.
I am really looking forward to some investors and
contributors who can be a part of this process. You can expect some amazing
perks and offers in return in terms of many services that are listed on my
website. You are going to be a part of it, so rest assured.
You will be granted full access to my domain and you will be
able to experience each and every detail as we progress together. All the funds
will be used entirely in making our portal a better place for the members of
the community that will be visiting it to gain benefits.
A good response is pretty much assured from my website
because it already has a good number of traffic and the main obstacle of
launching it has already been crossed and left behind. My work is already in
existence and i have created a great number of followers and supporters in the
mean time when i had been struggling hard.
The large number of visitors on my website and the followers
on my various social media portals is a clear indicator of the fact that there
should not be any problem in the future. Hence, success and the right kind of
development is very much ensured in the future when we have enough amount of
funds in order to carry the work forward.
The Developing Plan
We currently are in need of funds as there are several
things that need to be taken care of in order to let the development and
progress of the website be done in a periodic way and in an efficient manner.
We have thoroughly investigated the current scenario and have done considerable
amount of research in the market and on the world wide web so that we can
exactly know where we currently stand, what is to be done and what are the
estimated costs, time and deadlines associated with it.
We have allocated and broken down the amount of funds
required in the following sections:
Developmental
Overhaul of the entire structural design and Framework: - $1500
We have realized the need for change. Dynamic nature is
always important because change is the only entity which we are synonymous to.
The templates and the structures of the website will need to
be re-constructed in order to have an enhanced user appeal and more
accessibility by the users. An efficient User Interface and be a major factor
in the long run as it is something that can improve the user experience as it
guides and facilitates the user in reaching out to where they exactly want to.
These changes might seem to be small at first but they
contribute in a big way later on as we will see.
The Design Makeover:
- $1500
The layout and design of a website should be built in such a
way that it pleases to they senses of the audience and they actually enjoying
browsing around on your website. A badly or poorly designed website can be a
huge turn off for the audiences as it shows and conveys a lot about the
dedication that the owner has put into it.
More than half of the work is done if the appearance and
appeal of the website is satisfactory.
The specialized SEO
campaign: - $4000
Every portal requires some means in order to be existent and
findable over the world wide web. The internet is flooding and is full of
websites and resources related to almost every thing that a person can imagine.
So, how does your audience search for something in one of
the search engines and find your links? This is where the Search Engine
Optimization techniques kick in. This is a very vast and complex topic in
itself because usually it is not so simple to attract traffic and audience to
your website.
There are many ways and techniques by the use of which one
can improve the ranks of their websites and we too need to do the same so that
people can reach out to us first instead of wandering somewhere else.
This is a very rigorous process and requires a considerable
amount of time and dedication in order to be successful. Proper kinds of SEO
techniques for a website can be a blessing for the prospects of the website in
the future.
Advertising,
Expansion and Marketing in the Social Media: - $3000
Nowadays, any franchise or brand is incomplete without the
participation of Social Media. Establishments from the biggest to the smallest
always require the support of the Social Media at some point of time.
Social Media is a very crucial part of this long going
ordeal as it is one of the best methods to reach out to the people. The social
media and the social networks are the ultimate pool of traffic. There reside
all the users from different parts of the world. It is only up to us that how
exactly will we be able to let them know about our website.
Advertising is a very important part of any campaign as it
is the only medium by the use of which the audience comes to know about us.
The power of Social Media is so great that it is
unfathomable. It alone can lead a portal to victory with ease.
Expansion leads to the multiplication of processes on the
servers. A larger community means more traffic and more activities which is
very healthy and desirable for every domain.
Every entity and establishment depends largely on the
marketing that has been done for it. Every brand invests a large amount of
funds and efforts in marketing just to get recognition in the market because
this is important.
Hence, the conclusion is that these attributes are very
essential for every website and we too aim to do the same.B L O G M O S T       P E R K S BRONZE SUPPORTER - $5Thank you very much for your Big support on be half of BLOGMOST.We send you a BIG Thank you for the Great support you given for us.


SILVER SUPPORTER - $10
Blogmost is one of the Great website to have a Backlink for you.
Yes as the Silver supporter..you will have a Lifetime Contributor membership account for Guest posting
N.B. Please be kind enough to follow our posting guidelines.


GOLD SUPPORTER - $100 [LIMITED OFFER]
As the Biggest supporter we will place your banner advertisement on Blogmost Homepage (336*280 Banner)
Thank you very much  for the Great support..!






The Verdict
The future is well planned and the website has been going on
the right track till now. It just needs a push in terms of funding so that the
necessary details and changes can be added to the website along with the tools
and techniques which allow more and more traffic to be attracted to our portal.
This cannot be done without the support from other people.
Please become a part of our community and let us work towards a better future
for us together.  Other Ways You Can Help Some of you just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help us.  Please share campaign through Facebook,Twitter & other social media platforms. Remind your friends to use the Indiegogo share tools!   And that's all there is to it.Thank you Very much..!

story:
Summary

I am a 21 year old Student at Vincennes University. I am driven to open my restaurant. It has always been my dream to open a restaurant in Indianapolis but I have always been scared but now I am taking the leap of faith knowing that I can achieve my goal and have a successful business for  my children and their children. Cooking is fun and for that reason I will always do it.

21 by S Vaden (I am S Vaden) will be a technology advanced location. Waiters will take orders using  iPads' and accept payment the same way. 21 will be an exclusive wine only restaurant and will be the perfect place to go and grab lunch or dine in for an amazing dinner. Combining Music, Food and Technology together. Please donate money to help me achieve my dream and help more young people understand it's possible.

How you can help

I need $80,254.99

If my entire goal is not reached I have a planned tasting scheduled for April 10 in Indianapolis of which I am funding. That night will be used to attract investors and if my goal is not met here i will use what i receive here and at the tasting and combine it, and open my restaurant. I may have to make some adjustments to my plan but it will still ensure that i get the business open.

The Impact

21 will inspire young people to stay on the right track and keep their eyes on the prize. 21 will give young people a space to showcase their talent and it will also be a place for young and old people to be able to work together to advance the dreams and gifts of the younger crowd. 21 will give more jobs to younger people while at the same time keeping younger people from getting involved in things that will negatively impact their lives.. 21  will also put a positive stamp on African American youth showing them that their past doesn't determine future. So please donate anything you can. It will not only change my life but it will change an entire community 

I can't do it by myself 

The obstacle in opening this restaurant is mainly that most people I have encountered have not taken me seriously because i am only 21 and they don't believe a 21 year old can do this. I have invested over $10,000 dollars into achieving my dream and goal. I understand that some say failure is an option but i believe it is only an option if you allow it to be. I will not fail in my goal. This is not simply a dream it is a reality simply because i am doing it. I am 21 and my restaurants name is 21 and I will open it by May 2015.

Other Ways You Can Help

You can send this link to a  potential person who you think might want to invest or donate, become partners and don't forget to use Indiegogo share tools!

Thanks in advance any amount that is donated is much appreciated

story:
UPDATE, 7/4/2016
 

*** As you can see, this campaign did not garner much support.  I have been unsuccessful in contacting Mr. Phillipon, therefore, I will be refunding your generous donations (less costs) that you have entrusted me with.  I have only today taken the funds, as I cannot seem to refund you from here.  As there  are only 5 funders, I will contact you direct.  Thank-you.  

If you know how I may reach Mr. Phillipon, its not too late to let me know.  

___________________________________________________________________________________



 Do you value your civil liberties and freedoms?  Do you feel that they are being eroded away slowly but surely, even in our own great country of Canada?

I am sure that Alain Philippon, thinks so too, and that is exactly why he has refused to give his smart phone password to CBSA during a border search upon re-entering the country. 

You can read more about this, in the news story attached below. 

It’s about time that the laws that effectively result in illegal search and seizure of electronics at the border be challenged here in Canada, and right up to the Supreme Court, if necessary.  You see, the current laws were written in 1985, at a time when most of us had only seen a computer in a local institution, you know the one ... that did less than our smart phones are capable of today, yet filled a whole room? 

It takes great courage to resist the powers that be and stand upon your own convictions, and that is what Alain Philippon did on Monday in Halifax.  But it takes a whole lot more than that to make positive change in our legal landscape, because a proper legal challenge is something that is almost impossible for most people to attempt; it is surely a David and Goliath situation.  Because, it takes money, a lot of money:  and we need to help principled legal warriors like Mr. Philippon to put pressure on these laws to make the changes that are necessary for the benefit of us all. 

That is why I have set this campaign at $100,000.  It sounds like a lot, but it is definitely not a lot when it comes to the legal arena.  I want us to be able to encourage and assist Mr. Philippon in his legal defense, so that he can carry this issue forward without it bankrupting him. 

I also know what this feels like.  I had my computer detained for further examination after I refused to unlock it at Pearson.  I called a lawyer, and I was told that I did not have to do that.  To think that my refusal could have gotten me arrested or charged with a crime is mind blowing!  I asked my local MP’s office to put pressure to assist in the return of my property to no avail.  I have now been advised that my laptop will stay with them until I will provide my password.  So, I know a little bit about this, and I am thrilled that someone else is willing to push back on this issue. 

I’m putting this together quickly so that we can respond while the fire is hot.  While reading the comments below the attached article, numerous people suggested that ‘someone’ should put a campaign together, so, I am doing just that. 

As I said, this is being done quickly, but as this campaign rolls along, I will figure out how to put some accountability measures in place, so that you can be assured that all of your funds will go to its intended use, and should there be any balance, I would suggest that it gets placed in the trust of the Canadian Civil liberties Association to be earmarked for such other legal challenges. 

I will try to update as necessary, and please also feel free to send your ideas and helpful suggestions.

If you do not agree with the intended purpose of this campaign, that is also your right, but please respect that this page is not the place for you to argue or dispute it.   

 

http://www.cbc.ca/news/canada/nova-scotia/quebec-resident-alain-philippon-to-fight-charge-for-not-giving-up-phone-password-at-airport-1.2982236

story:
Tyndale Christian School Kenya Missions Trip


My daughter and I are going on a missions trip to Eldoret,Kenya in June 2015 organised by Tyndale Christian School in Salisbury East, South Australia.

For 2 1/2 weeks we will be doing volunteer work at two orphanages, Testimony Faith Homes and Neema Homes.

All funds raised will be used directly in the funding of projects to assist in the ongoing activities required to support the homes, and therefore provide a better quality of life for the children in their care.

Our travel costs and living expenses are borne by us and have been prepaid.

All participants on this trip (21 students, 5 teachers and 1 parent volunteer) are raising money to fund required building and maintenance projects.

 We have no administration costs so 100% of monies we raise will be used to buy building materials etc, to be used in building projects for the homes.

Previous projects have included perimeter fencing, barns, chicken coops, milking sheds, painting and maintenance work on existing dwellings.

Please support this great cause.

All funds raised will be used directly in the funding of projects to assist in the ongoing activities required to support the homes, and therefore provide a better quality of life for the children in their care.Our travel costs and living expenses are borne by us and have been prepaid. story:
Start a Tradition in Your Kitchen

In the kitchen, good cooks prefer carbon steel knives. Carbon blades sharpen much more easily than stainless steel. They take very well to a sharpening stone and will keep a great edge. Give your handcrafted 6 Inch High Carbon Steel Chefs Knife the simple care it deserves and you will be rewarded with a lifetime of service, and a knife that will be in your family for generations.

About Our Handcrafted High Carbon Steel Knives

Ask your butcher about the advantages high carbon steel knives. High carbon steel is not stainless steel. A great knife isn't about being shiny, It's about being flexible and strong. It's about taking a razor sharp edge quickly and easily. It's about breezing through a ripe summer tomato, or quartering a chicken in just minutes.

Carbon blades will develop a patina over time, and they require simple loving care. Wash and dry immediately after use. Coat the blade and handle with a little olive oil and store in a safe place. Don't store loose in a drawer with other knives or utensils. 

 

Who Are We? A Business Dedicated to Quality & Craftsmanship

That's  us, Knapp Made Products. I'm Larry Knapp. Our business is founded in a very simple idea. We design kitchen products that we would like to have. Then we search out the best craftsmanship we can find to produce the products. When we know we've got it right, production begins and then out to the cooks and kitchens of America.  We've been at it since 2011.

All of the traditional master skills are still out there. We find these talented individuals and companies.  Then, thanks to the connectivity offered by modern communication and reliable logistics, we can combine these resources to bring exceptional products to market.

The 6 Inch Chefs Knife

Production of the 6 Inch Chefs Knife is underway, to be ready for shipping around mid-October. We have the first production knives in hand. They are beautiful.  Superb craftsmanship, perfectly balanced and razor sharp. A 6 Inch 1095 carbon steel blade, with a full tang into a walnut handle, secured with three brass rivets. Overall length is 11 inches.  

Natural Whetstone Company

Nestled in the rolling beauty of the Ouachita Mountains of central Arkansas. Dave Davenport produces the world finest sharpening stones.

 Guided.co

Also on the team is David Stober of Guided.co in Seattle. David and the folks at Guided design and manufacture our eco-friendly Knapp Made Knife packaging.  Guided's focus on packaging for today's 'Maker' is the perfect pairing for our handcrafted knives.



The Everyday Knife for Every Kitchen

We have always believed that the most versatile kitchen knife is a 6 inch chefs knife. But they were difficult to find. So we designed the Knapp Made 6 Inch High Carbon Steel Chefs Knife. It took about a year to find the right knife makers, and another six months of discussion and prototypes. Now we have it. The perfect knife for every day in every American kitchen.

Please Support Our Campaign

  • Continued production of the High Carbon Steel 6 Inch Chefs Knife.
  • Design and prototype production of the High Carbon Steel 8 Inch Chefs Knife - Market Introduction March 2016
  • Design and prototype production of the High Carbon Steel 3 Inch Paring Knife - Market Introduction March 2016
  • Support quality craftsmanship.
  • Help us introduce a family tradition to every American kitchen.
  • Give deserving students a world of experience. 5% of total pledges will go to the Road Scholarship program of the SYTA Youth Foundation.
The Financial Goal
We are asking for $1,500 to pay for design and production of knife #2 - the 8 Inch Chefs Knife, and knife #3 - the 3 Inch High Carbon Steel Paring Knife.  

The Rewards
In exchange for your support, we are offering as perks:
  • The High Carbon Steel 6 Inch Chefs Knife. 
  • Deep discounting on the next knifes in the production pipeline - The 8 Inch High Carbon Steel Chefs Knife and 3 Inch High Carbon Steel Paring Knife.
  • A Genuine Arkansas Bench Whetstone Sharpener from Novaculite mined only in the Ouachita Mountain region of Central Arkansas. These are the finest sharpening stones in the world!

Production & Shipment
Production of the 6 Inch High Carbon Steel Chefs Knife for Indiegogo pledges begins in September 2015. Deliveries commence October 2015. All shipments will be made by the US Post Office, Priority Mail. All packages will have tracking numbers. 
Designing is already underway for the 8 Inch Chefs Knife and the 3 Inch High Carbon Steel Paring Knife. Discussion and prototypes should be complete by January 2016. Product launch is scheduled for March 2016.

About Knapp Made Products

We really enjoy being a small business and we truly believe in the products we bring to the market. Building relationships and friendships with customers and owners of cooking shops all across America is a very rewarding experience.

We hope you will join us as we grow - and share in the benefits of that growth. We will always introduce our new kitchen products here on Indiegogo.  Each new product that we bring to the American kitchen will first be made available to the Indiegogo community.

About The Handcrafted Knife You Will Receive

A good knife is a pleasure to handle, a joy to work with, a trusted cornerstone of every family kitchen. A good knife will become a family heirloom handed down from one generation to the next, just as the skills in making the knife are handed down from generation to generation. This is the inspiration behind our High Carbon Steel 6 Inch Chefs Knife. Two years in the making and now ready to bring quality craftsmanship and a family tradition to your kitchen.

Risks & Challenges

It's a big and complicated world.  Luckily, we've been honing our logistic skills for the past five years.  We are very good at meeting our planned production schedules and hitting our target shipment dates. Your pledge is in good hands.

Giving Back & Paying Forward

Traveling and studying abroad changes young lives for good. 5% of total pledges will go to the Road Scholarship program of the SYTA Youth Foundation.

The SYTA Youth Foundation established the Road Scholarship program in 2002 to award funds to youth who, for various reasons, are unable to afford the cost of student group trips. Based on the belief that travel is essential to a complete education, it is SYF's goal to make a positive difference, through travel, in the young lives of our global citizens. Since its inception, SYF has awarded over a 1,000 scholarships to deserving youth.


Thanks for your support,
Larry Knapp
Knapp Made Products

About Our Handcrafted High Carbon Steel Knives
Ask your butcher about the advantages high carbon steel knives. High carbon steel is not stainless steel. A great knife isn't about being shiny, It's about being flexible and strong. It's about taking a razor sharp edge quickly and easily. It's about breezing through a ripe summer tomato, or quartering a chicken in just minutes.
Carbon blades will develop a patina over time, and they require simple loving care. Wash and dry immediately after use. Coat the blade and handle with a little olive oil and store in a safe place. Don't store loose in a drawer with other knives or utensils.  
Who Are We? A Business Dedicated to Quality & Craftsmanship
That's  us, Knapp Made Products. I'm Larry Knapp. Our business is founded in a very simple idea. We design 
kitchen products that we would like to have. Then we search out the best craftsmanship we can find to produce the 
products. When we know we've got it right, production begins and then out to the cooks and kitchens of America.  We've 
been at it since 2011.
All of the traditional master skills are still out there. We find these talented individuals and companies.  Then, thanks to the connectivity offered by modern communication and reliable logistics, we can combine these resources to bring exceptional products to market.


The 6 Inch Chefs Knife
Production of the 6 Inch Chefs Knife is underway, to be ready for shipping around mid-October. We have the first production knives in hand. They are beautiful.  Superb craftsmanship, perfectly balanced and razor sharp. A 6 Inch 1095 carbon steel blade, with a full tang into a walnut handle, secured with three brass rivets. Overall length is 11 inches.  

Natural Whetstone Company
Nestled in the rolling beauty of the Ouachita Mountains of central Arkansas. Dave Davenport produces the world finest sharpening stones. Guided.coAlso on the team is David Stober of Guided.co in 
Seattle. David and the folks at Guided design and manufacture our 
eco-friendly Knapp Made Knife packaging.  Guided's focus on packaging 
for today's 'Maker' is the perfect pairing for our handcrafted knives.


The Everyday Knife for Every Kitchen
We have always believed that the most versatile kitchen knife is a 6 inch chefs knife. But they were difficult to find. So we designed the Knapp Made 6 Inch High Carbon Steel Chefs Knife. It took about a year to find the right knife makers, and another six months of discussion and prototypes. Now we have it. The perfect knife for every day in every American kitchen.
Please Support Our Campaign


Continued production of the High Carbon Steel 6 Inch Chefs Knife.
Design and prototype production of the High Carbon Steel 8 Inch Chefs Knife - Market Introduction March 2016

Design and prototype production of the High Carbon Steel 3 Inch Paring Knife - Market Introduction March 2016

Support quality craftsmanship.
Help us introduce a family tradition to every American kitchen.
Give deserving students a world of experience. 5% of total pledges will go to the Road Scholarship program of the SYTA Youth Foundation.


The Financial GoalWe are asking for $1,500 to pay for design and production of knife #2 - the 8 Inch Chefs Knife, and knife #3 - the 3 Inch High Carbon Steel Paring Knife.  The Rewards
In exchange for your support, we are offering as perks:

The High Carbon Steel 6 Inch Chefs Knife. 


Deep discounting on the next knifes in the production pipeline - The 8 Inch High Carbon Steel Chefs Knife and 3 Inch High Carbon Steel Paring Knife.


A Genuine 
        Arkansas Bench Whetstone Sharpener from Novaculite mined only in the Ouachita Mountain region of 
        Central Arkansas. These are the finest sharpening stones in the world!

Production & Shipment


Production of the 6 Inch High Carbon Steel Chefs Knife for Indiegogo pledges begins in September 2015. Deliveries commence October 2015. All shipments will be made by the US Post Office, Priority Mail. All packages will have tracking numbers. 


Designing is already underway for the 8 Inch Chefs Knife and the 3 Inch High Carbon Steel Paring Knife. Discussion and prototypes should be complete by January 2016. Product launch is scheduled for March 2016.



About Knapp Made Products

We really enjoy being a small business and we truly believe in the products we bring to the market. Building relationships and friendships with customers and owners of cooking shops all across America is a very rewarding experience.
We hope you will join us as we grow - and share in the benefits of that growth. We will always introduce our new kitchen products here on Indiegogo.  Each new product that we bring to the American kitchen will first be made available to the Indiegogo community.
About The Handcrafted Knife You Will Receive
A good knife is a pleasure to handle, a joy to work with, a trusted cornerstone of every family kitchen. A good knife will become a family heirloom handed down from one generation to the next, just as the skills in making the knife are handed down from generation to generation. This is the inspiration behind our High Carbon Steel 6 Inch Chefs Knife. Two years in the making and now ready to bring quality craftsmanship and a family tradition to your kitchen.
Risks & Challenges
It's a big and complicated world.  Luckily, we've been honing our logistic skills for the past five years.  We are very good at meeting our planned production schedules and hitting our target shipment dates. Your pledge is in good hands.
Giving Back & Paying Forward
Traveling and studying abroad changes young lives for good. 5% of total pledges will go to the Road Scholarship program of the SYTA Youth Foundation. 


The
 SYTA Youth Foundation established the Road Scholarship program in 2002 
to award funds to youth who, for various reasons, are unable to afford 
the cost of student group trips. Based on the belief that travel is 
essential to a complete education, it is SYF's goal to make a positive 
difference, through travel, in the young lives of our global citizens. 
Since its inception, SYF has awarded over a 1,000 scholarships to 
deserving youth.


Thanks for your support,

Larry KnappKnapp Made Products

story:
West Girard Community Council

When McDonald's wanted to open up along Girard Avenue, a community organization known as the Girard Avenue Alliance fought the giant's presence in their neighborhood.  They were more concerned with advocating for fresh food in the area than fast food.  

They won.

Shortly after, a small group of passionate individuals from the Alliance decided to incorporate and form the West Girard Community Council to better focus on the food access issues at hand.  They lobbied hard for a grocery store to open in their community.

This, however, would take years.

Due to the wait, the WGCC took matters into their own hands and contacted Farm to City to obtain a permit.  They began operating their own Farm Stand in order to ensure fresh produce for the residents of Brewerytown and Fairmount.  After a few years they decided to expand their efforts and began running a Food Cupboard to distribute groceries to neighbors in need: people in between jobs, seniors on low fixed incomes, or people that are working but still can't make ends meet.  Most of the food distributed comes through the government's SHARE Food Program.

What We Need & What You Get

Most years WGCC barely covers the operating costs of the Food Cupboard through grants and the profits of the Farm Stand.  

This year however was ESPECIALLY tough.

We have relied too heavily on the grants we have received for years and were completely caught off-guard when one of the requests was not funded.  We reached out to a local organization for EMERGENCY funding in order to keep the Food Cupboard's doors open and liability insurance paid.

Every board meeting we discuss all the great things we could do if we just had a little extra money, but every month we find ourselves with only enough funding for our premiums.  We'd like to use crowdfunding in order to pay off our bills early and start to really increase our impact on our community.

We need $2,500

  • This pays our insurance premiums: it covers the drivers that pick up our SHARE program food and the Farm Stand produce, liability insurance, and non-profit coverage.
Additional funding will go towards:
  • Supplemental food items to bolster our Food Cupboard offerings [WE WELCOME NON-PERISHABLE FOOD ITEMS AS WELL...EMAIL US IF YOU LIVE IN THE PHILADELPHIA AREA AND WOULD LIKE TO DONATE!]
  • Mailing costs.  Due to the costs, some months we eschew direct mailings and rely on word of mouth when the Food Cupboard is open for distribution.
  • Shelving and other storage needs.  The Fairmount Community Development Center has graciously given us space to house all our non-perishable food items.  We currently have two shelves and could always use more [especially when all your FOOD donations come rolling in!].  The space is only conducive to non-perishable food items and refrigeration would be a great help, but comes at a great cost. 

Impact

The Food Cupboard has helped over 269 households since beginning in 2008.  Currently we have over 35 active households that are recipients of our monthly distributions.

The Farm Stand has been operating for over a decade now and is a staple of the community.

Challenges

This year there have been multiple instances where the WGCC has considered folding.  All of those moments have stemmed from lack of funding.   We're a community in flux.  We have a lot of new people moving in and recognize how important it is to keep organizations running that have helped better the lives of long-term residents for years.  

We are working on finding more volunteers and increasing our visibility in the neighborhood.   

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Non-perishable food donations!!!!  Email us for information about dropping off in the Philadelphia area.
  • Spread the word via all your social media outlets. If you can't donate--share our campaign.  If you CAN donate--share our campaign!  Just share our campaign and help us reach our goal!
  • Volunteer!  If you live in Philadelphia and want to get involved contact us at westgirardcc@gmail.com 

Words cannot begin to describe our deep appreciation for all those helping us!
