Store: This item is the last, but most important of them all. The reason behind the store is that so we can become self-sufficient and be able to offer the above items and services completely free of charge, whatsoever.





 The second thing we will use the money for is renovation of the building, that will meet safety requirements to ensure a nice and soothing environment for all to enjoy. 




A walk-in freezer: So that any food in the food pantry will stay nice and fresh until you are able to take it home. 
 office furnishings for the whole entire building. 

Research materials: (i.e. paper, books, etc.) that we will give out, so that you can create your own business, land a job and for our many class room items

A bus: To safely transport people to job interviews, field trips, etc.

The library and PC Lab: So that you can be able to research any and all info you want, for the support you need!

The store: This item is the last, but most important of them all. The reason behind the store is that so we can become self-sufficient and be able to offer the above items and services completely free of charge, whatsoever. 





   

 As you sit and listen to those who commit hate crimes, self-infliction and much more, you can begin to understand how so many people act out their situations through their economic misunderstandings and lack of resources. 
As the economy goes down, discrimination and crime rises. Since, most don't understand how the economy falls, they begin to find reasons to hate or cause conflict, and when they begin to speak, most speak violently, but if you listen closely you can see that they really are crying for help. Not only that, due to miseducation and very little knowledge of other cultures, we fight amongst ourselves. That's why, we, at 5th Wind Nation feel that creating a Unity Center that provides educational and fundamental value to all walks of life, we believe this will unify and lower crime rates and depression. 
   Risks & Challenges  As far as we know, there has not been another organization who has attempted to accomplish our goals on this scale, because of that some of the risks are unknown. 
There has been a few companies that have attempted to do parts of what we're doing and from that we realize what risks may come.  For one, when dealing with food pantries, sometimes the food can spoil extremely fast or be unfit for human consumption. We plan to meet this challenge by having a walk-in freezer unit.
This would allow us to properly store the food in a way so that it would not be ruined before giving it out to the public. 
   




 If you'd like to contribute but lack the funds, there are many ways you can help: 
By spreading the word about our fundraiser! Ask us questions and get involved and we will answer anything you ask! ☺ Let us know any ideas and/or tips that you think may help! (We encourage people to speak their minds!) 
Once the Unity Center is built, you can donate items that you think others may need that you no longer have use for.

story:
Hi, My name is Heather Burdette.

I am the founder of, the 501(c)3 non-profit organization, Prevailing Moxie Therapeutic Riding Center.  We began working to improve lives through connections with horses in 2010.  
Over the last five years we have improved the lives of students with Autism and Aspergers, Prader Willi Syndrome, Down Syndrome, Cerebral Palsy, Attention Deficit Disorder, Sensory Disorders,  Dyslexia, Anxiety and other challenges.
For a variety of reasons, many of our students are not ready to actually ride horses right away.  We need to build their confidence and their balance and core strength so they can have the safest and most positive experience possible while riding horses.  Also, we are based in Ohio and operate year-around.  We have an indoor riding arena.  Often it is still too cold for our students over the winter.  This hinders our ability to ensure our students reap the full benefit of our services.  

We Need to Purchase an Equicizer

An Equicizer is a product which mimics the movement of the horse.  We would use it  in a heated and air conditioned room so it could be used year-round.  Because of its design, it would assist us with accomplishing many goals such as:

  1. Building confidence;
  2. Increasing core and gross motor strength prior to riding;
  3. Stretching for riders who have tight muscles and/or joints;
  4. Allow us to safely and easily explain and demonstrate new exercises; and,
  5. Take fewer days off due to weather, thus increasing the benefit to our students.
Equicizers have been used in therapeutic riding centers for over 20 years.  Their track record is proven.  We want to provide our students with everything they need to be successful and gain the maximum benefit from our services.  They work hard and deserve the best from us.  The following video shows how the Equicizer has been employed in another therapeutic riding program located about an hour and a half from us.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rKEFJB1YZ1M 
The Classic Equicizer costs about $3,000.  The manufacturer is in state.  So we would pick it up to eliminate shipping.  We also would not have to pay taxes since we are a non-profit.  

Your Support Will Help Every Student We Serve

All of our students work hard everyday to do their best.  We owe it to them to do our best to help them succeed.  Therapeutic riding is an accepted practice to improve outcomes for all of the ailments listed above and more.  Not only will the Equicizer improve our ability to serve our current students, it will also help to increase the number of students we can help.  That means your donation will have a multiplying effect.

Risks & Challenges

If we are unable to raise the entire $3,000 through this fundraiser, our ability to purchase the Equicizer will be delayed.  With your help, we can purchase the Equicizer before Summer.  If we do not reach our target, your money will not go to waste.  We will work to employ other methods to raise the remaining funds.  We are highly committed to purchasing and using this critical piece of equipment.  If we raise funds in excess of the $3,000, they will be used to improve the safety of our riding arenas.

Other Ways You Can Help

Prevailing Moxie Therapeutic Riding Center can also use non-monetary assistance.  Please Like our FaceBook page, "Prevailing Moxie TRC".  Please invite your friends to join our page.  If you have experience in marketing, we could use some pro bono assistance.

If you live in the Delaware, Ohio area and are interested in volunteering, we would love to hear from you.  Of course, we would love to hear from any potential students.  If you have any horse, rider or lesson type equipment that you want to donate, I'm sure we could put it to good use.

Thank all of you for your support!  We are fortunate to have so many people who believe in and support our program.

story:
Project Summary

The plan over the next 12 months is to deliver FREE CrossFit courses to 80 of the most vulnerable people in the Wirral area of the UK. Not only are we using CrossFit, we're also delivering: mindfulness meditation sessions, to help people cope better with stress; employability training, to increase confidence in entering the job market; community action projects, such as pallet-furniture building for local social housing residents; voluntary  placements, to encourage local people to connect with their local community; and peer mentoring, to encourage and support people make it the end of the programme. All of this is as a way of helping to influence the lives of local people struggling with mental health issues, drug problems, homelessness, unemployment, social isolation and at-risk young people. 

We need to generate enough funding to get the project running for the first year, after which we plan to approach local councils with our evidence and look for investors. My community is in the 3% most deprived communities in the entire UK. And we have some of the lowest life-expectancy rates for men nationally. Something really does need to change. 

 If we could encourage just 4 people from every box worldwide to donate £1 each, we would have more than enough money to get started on the project.


If you've ever done CrossFit, just quickly ask yourself the following questions:

Has CrossFit changed your life in any way?

Has it made you a stronger person? Both physically and mentally?

Has it helped you overcome any difficulties in your life?

Has it changed your perception of yourself in any way?

Have you forged new friendships with people you are likely to be friends with for a very long time? 

Do you feel apart of something exciting? 

Do you finally feel accepted and a part of a community?

I've asked these same questions to so many people in the last year or two, and nearly everyone has responded with an incredibly touching and inspirational story. 

It was these stories that gave me hope. Hope that positive change, on a mass-scale, is possible. If those same stories that I hear are coming out of each and every one of the 10, 000 CrossFit gyms worldwide, then change on a mass-scale IS possible. 

But my question then was this: if CrossFit can facilitate so much change in the world and impact so many people's lives for the better, how can we take it even further; how can we take CrossFit to the heart of the communities where social deprivation, unemployment, poor mental health, drug, alcohol, social isolation, a disconnect with society, crime, appalling physical health, unhappiness, social isolation, disconnectedness from society and from one another is rife? Because it's here where we need to see change on a global scale; from the very bottom. 

In my community, there certainly aren't anywhere near enough stories like the ones I've heard from fellow CrossFitters, 

My view of how we ‘fix’ that which is ‘broken’ has changed considerably since working in mental health services these past few years. Many of us have a natural tendency to view both people and society as ‘broken’, and as a result we look for solutions as to how we can ‘fix’ their problems. This has been the dominant approach for many years, by both mental health services and by our governments; however, this approach does not seem to be working. 

What makes more sense, to me at least, is to look at people and at communities and ask: What is 'working' here? What is this person or this community doing well? Where are the strengths? How can we build on these strengths? And when it comes to communities, how can we extend these benefits to the wider community? Because every community has its strengths. And in my community, one of the biggest strengths is CrossFit. 

This campaign is about taking CrossFit to the rest of the communities in Wirral; to the communities that are rated as being in the 3% most socially deprived areas in the entire UK. Because they could really do with it. 


What we need your help with

In order to do this, we need your help to kick start the project and get things off the ground. We want to deliver free, 12 week CrossFit courses to mental health service-users, drug & alcohol service users, young people who are not in employment, education or training, those experiencing homelessness, youth offenders; basically anyone we can identify in the community who would benefit from having the chance to be a part of the CrossFit community. And as well as this, we've already put together a programme which includes the likes of mindfulness, yoga, employability training, voluntary work and community action. We've linked in with local organisations who are eager to be involved or show their support to the project, including: CrossFit Bromborough, The Youth Federation, Magenta Housing, AiW Health, Community Soul Cafe, Connexions, Community Action Wirral and Liverpool John Moore's University.  

With our 12 weeks courses, not only will we be giving people a chance to build on their physical health, mental well-being, social networks, self-perceptions, confidence, employability and connectedness; together, we may also be creating future CrossFit champions. Imagine that.

We're trying to raise £35,443 to run the project for one year. During this first year we plan to work with a total of 80 people from the most deprived areas of Wirral. Following the first year, we will then have enough data to be able to approach investors with a solid evidence-base to show that CrossFit can significantly impact social well-being in the heart of some of the countries most deprived communities; and that it would be in the best interest of the community, the local council and local health services to start investing in this idea. 

The money will pay for the hire a CrossFit venue and coach, a Project Manager, travel costs for several volunteers who will act as mentors on the project, travel costs for participants, training costs, office space for part-time admin, insurance, a laptop, and money towards setting up a furniture upcycling project for participants to restore or create furniture for local social housing tenants.

If we don't raise sufficient funds to run the project for a year, every penny we do raise will be put towards running the project for as long as possible with as many people as possible. And in that time we can only hope to have collected enough data to then be able approach funders with our evidence. 


A little bit about us

If you're going to invest in us, you should probably know who we are...

We are called APEx CIC - Advocating Physical Exercise - and we are a non-profit community interest company. We have been working with the Wirral community for the past 8 years, helping some of the most vulnerable amongst us start exercising in order to experience the psychological benefits of regular exercise. Historically, we've worked primarily with mental health and drug and alcohol service users; however, more recently we've started working with the entire community, no matter the problem. We acknowledge that people from all across society want to start exercising, but like many of us originally, find it extremely difficult to know where to start. So we offer additional support to people in the form buddies or mentors - volunteers who work alongside people for up to 12 weeks at a time to help them build on their fitness, improve confidence, increase their psychological well-being, reduce social isolation and to help them overcome any barriers preventing them from continuing with regular exercise.

And not to forget CrossFit Bromborough. We’ve received amazing support from the owner, James, and his wife, Gemma. James has led community outreach projects for many years in the community and remains passionate and committed to continuing with this through CrossFit in the future.


And a bit about me

It was just over two years ago when I started training at our community's first CrossFit facility, CrossFit Wirral. Right away I started thinking how incredibly life-changing it would be if APEx service-users had a chance to be a part of a CrossFit community. The only barrier, though, was money. The majority of APEx participants are out-of-work - mostly because of poor mental health and a severe lack of confidence in themselves - and are therefore unable to afford the cost of a monthly CrossFit membership. But CrossFit would help with both of these - poor mental health and low self-confidence. 

So this was when my quest to get CrossFit out to the rest of the community began. Since then I've been out and collected my own data on how CrossFit members feel their lives have been impacted by CrossFit; I've created online questionnaires; I've visited different facilities around the country who have been doing work with local schools and mental health services; I've spent months putting together bids for funding from the likes of Comic Relief and Big Lottery Fund - both of which have been unsuccessful at this stage; I've spent weeks liaising with other local services to tell them about my ideas and get them on-board for future projects; and all of this I've done as a volunteer for APEx whilst working full-time with an NHS early intervention for psychosis service. Unfortunately, during this time, I was made redundant from the NHS as a result of heavy austerity measures in the UK. I, like thousands of others in the last 5 years, was a part of the 3% ‘savings’ imposed on the NHS. 

But let’s not get bitter. How could I be bitter when I'm now able to focus even more energy on following what I'm truly passionate about: creating positive social change.  Firstly in my own community, and then on a national level. If this model works to improve the social well-being in Wirral, then I believe it will work on a nationwide level.              


Other Ways You Can Help

I know there's going to be a lot of people out there who want to help but can't contribute on a financial level. Don't worry, you can still help us.

Help us get the word out and make some noise about our campaign. The CrossFit community is the biggest and most cohesive international community that have yet to come across. Please help us get it to each and every one of the 10, 000 CrossFit gyms across the planet. Share on your CrossFit Facebook page, share with your friends, share on Twitter, MySpace (do people still use MySpace?!), Instagram, share with your Nan (Nan's love this kind of thing).

story:
Short

Summary-poultry farming is one of activities that have made youth in Uganda a fortune to earn a living out of due to the high rate of unemployment currently shooting at 78% on the recent Updates from united nations.reff   http://goo.gl/CkZoXJ

Uganda remains one of the poorest countries in the world, ranked 145 out of 177 countries by the Human Development Index and per capita income is approximately US$500, life expectancy is approximately 54 years and population growth is amongest the highest in the world with 3/4 totaling to only youth below 30 years. .



The strategies of MY poultry  project include the Following:

  • Improve the economic condition of the community through poultry farming business especially youth as well as other sectors of society as a whole.
  • Train the youth in income generative activities through financial literacy training program in order to generate enough money to support their families.
  • To act as a youth demonstration center where youth will meet to train and Seek information.
  • Train youth farmers to acquire more efficient management skills in poultry Production, feed mixing, storage, processing and marketing.
  • Help youth farmers to objectively focus on the needs of the family and the demands of the market and promote high value market-oriented meat and eggs
  • Providing improved varieties of   breeds of poultry that are quick maturing and high yielding under average systems of management.
  • Community mobilization and sensitization of the people to actively participate in the various project components. In particular to encourage youth farmers to voluntarily form small farmer groups/associations and societies based on the interest they themselves have in each enterprise.
  • Assist the government and nongovernmental organizations (NGOs) in the campaign in relation to poultry farming and, in caring, protecting and preserving natural resources and the environment for sustainable development.

    The Impact

    It will reduce unemployment rate in Uganda .
    The community will benefit through learning other skills like feed mixing.
    boosting production for the country through chicken meat and eggs.
    Reduced crime rate since most youth will be busy.
    Bring in community collaboration while embracing the spirit of hard work

    Risks & Challenges-

    since most , diseases, training manuals ans equipment eg books, computers, projectors for training sessions,high government and local taxes for rising enterprenuer, high cost of feeds and lack of an incubator

177 countries by the Human Development Index and per capita income is approximately
US$500, life expectancy is approximately 54 years and population growth is amongest the highest in the world with 3/4 totaling to only youth below 30 years. . 

   

The strategies of MY poultry  project
include the Following:

Improve
     the economic condition of the community through poultry farming business especially youth as well as other sectors of
     society as a whole.

Train
     the youth in income generative activities through financial literacy training
     program in order to generate enough money to support their families.
To act as a youth demonstration center where youth will meet to train and Seek
     information.


Train
     youth farmers to acquire more efficient management skills in poultry Production, feed mixing, storage, processing and marketing.
Help
     youth farmers to objectively focus on the needs of the family and the
     demands of the market and promote high value market-oriented meat and eggs

Providing
     improved varieties of   breeds of poultry that are
     quick maturing and high yielding under average systems of management.


Community
     mobilization and sensitization of the people to actively participate in
     the various project components. In particular to encourage youth farmers
     to voluntarily form small farmer groups/associations and societies based
     on the interest they themselves have in each enterprise.
Assist
     the government and nongovernmental organizations (NGOs) in the campaign in
     relation to poultry farming and, in caring, protecting and preserving
     natural resources and the environment for sustainable development.

    The ImpactIt will reduce unemployment rate in Uganda .The community will benefit through learning other skills like feed mixing.boosting production for the country through chicken meat and eggs.Reduced crime rate since most youth will be busy.Bring in community collaboration while embracing the spirit of hard work
  Risks & Challenges-
since most , diseases, training manuals ans equipment eg books, computers, projectors for training sessions,high government and local taxes for rising enterprenuer, high cost of feeds and lack of an incubator

story:
BreadCycle is asking for your help to purchase a new cargo bike!


-The traditional Dutch bakfiets (cargo bike).


What we will buy with your support

  • 1 Bakfiets (cargo bike): 2000 EUR
  • 2 Coolers: 200 EUR
  • Food Containers: 50 EUR
  • Utensils: 20 EUR
As a grassroots organization founded on volunteer support, we lack the resources to expand and fulfill our true potential. As of now we are using a 70-liter backpack to transport food six days per week to our centers for refugees and the homeless. The money we raise with this campaign will be used to purchase one cargo bike, which will increase our carrying capacity 3-fold and give us the ability to conduct simultaneous pickups. 
With this acquisition,  we can increase our number of volunteers and begin branching out our operations to provide a more holistic diet to refugees and the homeless in Amsterdam. In addition to a cargo bike, we will also use the donated funds to purchase coolers to preserve perishable food until we can deliver it. 

-Baguettes donated by Gebroeders Nemeijer

Nate collecting brownies for homeless

Spartak and Nate on their way to Regenboog Groep center for homeless.

Food waste and Homelessness in The Netherlands 

One of the first things that made an impression on us when we first moved to the Netherlands was the unmistakable fondness for bicycles and it resonated. They give the country a quaintness reminiscent of a simpler time. Another remarkable aspect of Dutch culture is a deep appreciation for social equality and a drive for social action. When you combine these characteristics together and add a city full of generous bakeries, cafes and restaurants, you have BreadCycle. 


-Amsterdam (Attrib. Bert Kaufmann).


The Netherlands is an amazing country, with its canals, windmills and 17th century architecture. And even amid all of its beauty, there are still over 27000 people who are homeless throughout the country. Similarly, there are is a growing number of people coming from countries stricken by famine and war, seeking a better life. According to the UN High Commissioner for Refugees, there were over 76,000 refugees living in the Netherlands and a 66% increase in asylum request between 2013 and 2014.


 -Nate loading up the backpack @ Gebroeders Nemeijer.


About us 

 While these are complex social issues, with BreadCycle we have found an elegant solution to provide homeless and refugees with a facet of support, by supplying them with edible food that would otherwise go to waste. In 2011, 2163 kilotons of avoidable food waste was produced in the Netherlands and it is our goal to put as much of this food as we can to good use.

Girls at Gebr. Niemeijer


-Asylum seekers from our refugee support partner Wij Zijn Hier (We are Here).

-Margot and Spartak delivering bread to The Rainbow Group homeless shelter.


Working with our charity partners, we are reaching out to restaurants, cafes and bakeries, asking for any easily transportable food they may have left over at the end of the day. When we have arranged a time for pick-up, one of our volunteers picks up the food and delivers it to one of our three charity partners in Amsterdam. And the more we do, the more we realize how much more could potentially be done.


-Unloading the bread at The Rainbow Group.


-With The Rainbow Group volunteers.

Occasionally we have volunteers joining our efforts. Here is Stanislav Wald helping to deliver 25 kilos of bread!

What we're asking

Your support can help us significantly in reducing waste and raising awareness to create a more cohesive and empathetic society. 
If this is something you can are willing to get behind, please share this campaign and follow us on Facebook to stay up to date on our organization's developments! 

- The BreadCycle Team

story:
Short Summary

  Hi! My name is Mathieu, the promoted minion behind Straightforward Computers. I'm the one in the picture above. I'm the owner, employee, and helpful soul you would encounter if you walk into the store. Straightforward Computers is a small computer repair shop located in Scappoose, Oregon. And by small, we mean squished between larger businesses like the first kid in a game of Sardines.

   The mission at Straightforward Computers, and my passion, is to offer affordable, understandable, and straightforward technical help to the community. 

   I  understand all too well how frustrating and difficult technology is when it doesn't work or it's new to you. And I enjoy helping people get through difficulties and on their way again.

   The biggest problem that Straightforward Computers has encountered in offering help to the community is visibility. Every other business on the block has a perpendicular sign advertising who they are. We've managed to purchase a lighted sign, but don't have the funds to get the permits and to get it mounted properly. This sign would make it easier to let people know we are out there and allow us to expand our mission to bigger and better things. We need your help to do it!


What We Need & What You Get

   $900 is sought to be able to mount and light our new sign outside the shop. $600 is to seek permission from the powers that be in the form of permits and to deal with any unexpected costs. Special equipment will be necessary to raise the sign on high so it may proudly announce our location to the world (well, our little corner of the world). 

   If we don't reach our goals, it will still get us closer to where we need to be. Additional funds above the amount raised will be used to get the word out about us, optimize our efficiency, improve our infrastructure, and to allow us to continue to offer low-cost services to the community.

   We are offering the following perks to anyone who donates:

   * Free computer advice and consultation. Just pick up a phone and call us!

   * Are you in the area? Free pickup or delivery in the Scappoose/St. Helens area!

   * And a few other helpful goodies!


The Impact

   We have been in our location for six years (6 years!). We do our best to help our community. We offer advice, suggestions, free 15 minute evaluations, pickup & delivery, on-site home and business assistance, and keep prices for repairs as reasonable as possible. Without a sign to show that we exist, we've been hard pressed to be noticed, and it shows. Almost every customer we've ever had has been by word of mouth. With the sign up and mounted, we'll be much more visible and be better able to help people.


Risks & Challenges

   The challenges of a small business in a rural community are many. Despite the fact that we've set up shop in a  good location, we've been unable to take full advantage of it. As such, if we aren't able to get enough business, we may have to close our doors, and I don't want to do that. I can see the impact I have in improving people's lives, and it's one of the things that gives me tremendous motivation.

Other Ways You Can Help

We know not everyone is able to help with money. That's ok! That  doesn't mean you can't help.

Please help us get the word out about our plight! Share this, talk about us, come in and visit! Have a computer that needs fixed? Great!

Our hours are:
    10am - 6pm Monday through Friday

    10am - 5pm on Saturday

 Our phone number is: 503-987-1472

Visit us at: 52555 Columbia River Highway Scappoose Oregon


Thank you for your consideration!

story:
Introduction
Baltimore Hackerspace has been a member funded community workshop for the last 6 years, providing a location, tools, and training for people who wish to work on personal and collaborative projects. We are located in East Baltimore, off Rt. 40 in an industrial business park, allowing us the space and freedom to work on projects that would not be feasible in a more residential area, during hours that residential neighbors might get upset with.

Our entry into the PPPRS (Power Racing Series) at NY Maker Faire 2013


What We Need

As a hackerspace, we've been met with rising bills, as our rent and utilities keep increasing, while a relatively stable number of members pay dues falling just short of the break-even point. Recently, our landlord "discovered" a number water bills that he'd missed over the past two years, and he's passing that expense on to us. At the same time, we've reduced membership rates, so we have a steady stream of new members. What we need is a small amount to keep us financially stable as we build up our membership ranks.

What You Get

As an established Hackerspace, we have many cool projects, materials, and tool available to us, which we plan to put to good use thanking everyone who is able to contribute. Some of the perks include 3d printed toys, laser cut mechanisms and art, T-shirts, and more! Some of our members have even stepped forward to offer some more personalized rewards, such as a chance to race on our power wheels racing series electric karts that we made from scratch, to personal lessons in microprocessor programming on popular platforms such as Arduino, PIC, Raspberry PI, and more!

Please note we started this campaign a bit earlier than we meant to, so check back in a few days for a more complete and creative list of goals.


A prototype of the "coin" perk (Much nicer now)


The Impact

As a 501(c)3 charity, we work to promote growth and learning in our community by providing people a place to learn and work in a positive and collaborative environment. We are sustained by our membership dues, however we do open up all of our classes and events to non members, and try to provide at least 2-3 days per week where non members can come in and work with our facilities.

We understand many of the challenges that face young makers today, and strive to make our facilities available for those who cannot afford much of the equipment we have, as well as giving people a chance to try different things without having to commit a huge investment in tools or supplies, before knowing if they would like to pursue a given hobby more deeply.

The loss of our facilities would cause great difficulty for the people who rely on us for their projects, and conversely our growth will greatly benefit the community by allowing us to provide additional services and facilities for even more creative hobbies.


Hex the bipedal robot, a longterm member project by Mark Haygood


Other Ways to Help

We always can use volunteers! If you'd like to teach a class, train people in the use of tools, or help write grants, we'd love to have you! Come on out to an Open Hack Night and meet the team!

Keep in Touch with us!

Website: http://baltimorehackerspace.com/
Meetup: http://www.meetup.com/Baltimore-Hackerspace/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/HarfordHacker
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pages/Baltimore-Hacker...

story:
Zephyr, Roy and Woody 

The Kentucky Foothills Therapeutic Horsemanship Center, (KFTHC) has been dedicated to improving the quality of life of VETERANS and YOUTH with physical, emotional and developmental disabilities since 2005.  KFTHC serves 10 counties across South-Central Kentucky and because of this participants and their families travel as much as ninety minutes to participate in therapeutic horsemanship lessons.

The generosity of the community has allowed us to provide services in Richmond for the last five years. Jacks Creek Riding Stables (JCRS) has offered us a home, free of charge, to operate this program for the last three years.  However, KFTHC could be one decision away from being homeless.

Our participants and families have come to depend on us for our services and for many of our riders we provide them the best hour of their week. KFTHC allows people with developmental, physical and emotional challenges to walk, run and play with the freedom only an equine partnership can provide.  Volunteers help facilitate these special relationships and have the opportunity to learn about the magic of giving.


Jacks Creek Riding Stables

Our goal is to raise $300,000 to acquire our own facility and open as a full time therapeutic riding program to assist even more riders. We need your help in making this happen and allowing us to have our own home and assist not only the people that we help now, but allow us to reach out to others that could benefit from equine therapy. 


Sammy and Cody on Woody at the Special Equestrian Olympics

KFTHC has been providing sustainable therapeutic services to more than 200 families in Central Kentucky for over eleven years. KFTHC has served veterans and their families for the last five years. KFTHC's riders range from the youngest being 2 years old to the oldest being 86.

Benefits to participants include:

·  Increased Muscle Strength

·  Improved Spatial Organization

·  Improved Communication Skills

·  Improved Cognitive Comprehension

·  Improved Balance and Rhythm

·  Improved Problem Solving Skills

KFTHC cannot develop a long term strategic plan without a stable base of operations. Grantors prefer to allocate funds to organizations with permanent facilities, thus many grants are unavailable to KFTHC at this time.  With your generous donations and support of our land acquisition it will make it possible for KFTHC to qualify for grants, expand our programming and make improvements to our infrastructure. 


What a Great Bunch!

We wish we could say “that's all there is to it”, but there is always more! We need you to help us share our mission, our story, and our goal! And please know that What you gain from helping our riders will be more rewarding than the tax deduction you get for helping fund us. 

For more about us visit us on Facebook and http://www.kfthc.org/

Please share our campaign with your friends, family, church members, business associates, neighbors, horse-lovers, and anyone else!

And please, come visit us if you are in Richmond, Kentucky, we would love to meet you and thank you personally!

story:
Short Summary:
This is an official Greek Fundraising campaing. Not some charity for the poor Greeks.

Many things will be explained here and i hope people around the world will understand what it needs to successfully end this chaos in Greece.
WHAT I ASK, WHAT YOU GET?
Every coin can become a profit if invested. 
The whole campaign is based on Yanis Varoufakis article theory about bitcoins and how powerful they are as a currency. We believe Yanis, why should he spend so much time praising a currency such as Bitcoin if its fake? 
We need your support to create the biggest Bitcoin miner in Greece and our only chance to pay our dues in less than 60 years. It takes only one euro from you to invest and help us create. 
This idea is not supported from our government but we must find a way ourselves to do something out of our field of deals and support the fight against the tyrrany of Europe. 
The more we earn the faster we will pay Europe and keep our economy in a balance rope. 
So, what will you get from all this? I can promise a 100% profit for every single Euro invested. I can keep track of any investor and pay back either your campaigns or send you the money via Bitcoin. The only thing i do not know is the payback time. It's up to the miner's speed to send profit back to us and then to you. 
A REMINDER OF WHAT HAPPENED TO THE WHOLE EUROPE
After 6 months of failed negotiations between Greece and Europe, Prime Minister Tsipras taken over the whole situation and asked the people what they want. Europe deal or Greek deal. The people (after so much propaganda from media) said NO proudly. But media tried to manipulate their thoughts about what the refendum is. 
So we believed that the refendum was a rejection to Europe and we all fell from the sky. 
PM cleared i am going myself to Europe to deal for something better. Not a five month death sentence or chaotic Grexit. Just a deal for the next years to help him create a path into the flourishing economy. 
This is why Europe doesnt want our PM because he is a visionary leader of the whole Europe and he can bring balance to equal rights. 
But PM brought back the heaviest deal package and he calls us to bear this weight. It was the only thing possible to do after 17 hours. 
Everyone named it a coup to our country and everyone knows they are the next ones to be slayed. Are you sure you want this Europe? We want our democratic Europe not an Empire under the ugly face of that man with a bear. But we need an 'illegal' weapon to fight back the monsters something that will work in the same line as our economy undercover and out of sight. Just as support.
THE SHORT PLAN
Take everything you wanna spare and keep building the miner. The more speed, the more money will be collected. We need to support our government to keep our nation healthy and not hungry while they are using spare resources for other priorities. Its a difficult time we are facing people. This is why we are calling everyone around the world. Fight with us, support us!
THE REAL TARGET
If we establish enough devices we can cover your investments while funding the government official account with money. We will also earn their support and maybe they will spare electricity support or an unused building to keep ugrading the miner with more devices. The more the better. 
THE LONG PLAN
We do not expect our miner to mine billions to pay Europe. We are honest we want to end this unfair situation but even bitcoins are not enough to cover our dues. But we can  support the greek economy and cover their expenses and little by little we can fix the damage created by previous governments. 
To close, our future is in your hands and your future inside and outside Eurozone and euro is in our hands. If Greece fails every damned nation will fall. Total chaos.
 Support us create the biggest miner ever and use Bitcoin as our weapon.
I hope that was enough to write. If you have more questions you can contact me and discuss. 

We love you all
We need you all

This is an official Greek Fundraising campaing. Not a charity.
story_txt:
Short Summary:This is an official Greek Fundraising campaing. Not some charity for the poor Greeks.
Many things will be explained here and i hope people around the world will understand what it needs to successfully end this chaos in Greece.
WHAT I ASK, WHAT YOU GET?Every coin can become a profit if invested. The whole campaign is based on Yanis Varoufakis article theory about bitcoins and how powerful they are as a currency. We believe Yanis, why should he spend so much time praising a currency such as Bitcoin if its fake? We need your support to create the biggest Bitcoin miner in Greece and our only chance to pay our dues in less than 60 years. It takes only one euro from you to invest and help us create. This idea is not supported from our government but we must find a way ourselves to do something out of our field of deals and support the fight against the tyrrany of Europe. The more we earn the faster we will pay Europe and keep our economy in a balance rope. So, what will you get from all this? I can promise a 100% profit for every single Euro invested. I can keep track of any investor and pay back either your campaigns or send you the money via Bitcoin. The only thing i do not know is the payback time. It's up to the miner's speed to send profit back to us and then to you. A REMINDER OF WHAT HAPPENED TO THE WHOLE EUROPEAfter 6 months of failed negotiations between Greece and Europe, Prime Minister Tsipras taken over the whole situation and asked the people what they want. Europe deal or Greek deal. The people (after so much propaganda from media) said NO proudly. But media tried to manipulate their thoughts about what the refendum is. So we believed that the refendum was a rejection to Europe and we all fell from the sky. PM cleared i am going myself to Europe to deal for something better. Not a five month death sentence or chaotic Grexit. Just a deal for the next years to help him create a path into the flourishing economy. This is why Europe doesnt want our PM because he is a visionary leader of the whole Europe and he can bring balance to equal rights. But PM brought back the heaviest deal package and he calls us to bear this weight. It was the only thing possible to do after 17 hours. Everyone named it a coup to our country and everyone knows they are the next ones to be slayed. Are you sure you want this Europe? We want our democratic Europe not an Empire under the ugly face of that man with a bear. But we need an 'illegal' weapon to fight back the monsters something that will work in the same line as our economy undercover and out of sight. Just as support.THE SHORT PLANTake everything you wanna spare and keep building the miner. The more speed, the more money will be collected. We need to support our government to keep our nation healthy and not hungry while they are using spare resources for other priorities. Its a difficult time we are facing people. This is why we are calling everyone around the world. Fight with us, support us!THE REAL TARGETIf we establish enough devices we can cover your investments while funding the government official account with money. We will also earn their support and maybe they will spare electricity support or an unused building to keep ugrading the miner with more devices. The more the better. THE LONG PLANWe do not expect our miner to mine billions to pay Europe. We are honest we want to end this unfair situation but even bitcoins are not enough to cover our dues. But we can  support the greek economy and cover their expenses and little by little we can fix the damage created by previous governments. To close, our future is in your hands and your future inside and outside Eurozone and euro is in our hands. If Greece fails every damned nation will fall. Total chaos. Support us create the biggest miner ever and use Bitcoin as our weapon.I hope that was enough to write. If you have more questions you can contact me and discuss. We love you allWe need you allThis is an official Greek Fundraising campaing. Not a charity.

story:
N'étant pas très douée pour les longues logorrhées textuelles destinées à convaincre les foules, je vais donc simplement commencer par vous présenter mon projet en quelques mots.
Libre à vous ensuite, si mon projet vous parle, de continuer à lire et découvrir qui je suis ainsi que mon parcours.


Mon projet :

Mon projet est simple :
Suite à un licenciement économique, je me retrouve au chômage et souhaiterais me reconvertir.
Mais cette fois, pas de travail par défaut qui permet de gagner un minimum survie mais laisse un goût âpre dans la bouche; ce goût âpre d'être inutile, de travailler pour un salaire de misère et de n'être qu'un pion au sein d'une entreprise dont le seul but est de rentrer de l'argent, encore et toujours plus d'argent. Non. Cette fois mon choix est de sortir de ce système pour me réaliser, pour faire quelque-chose de constructif, qui apporte quelque-chose, non seulement à moi, mais à la planète.

Car oui, l'écologie est un sujet qui me touche tout particulièrement, et je pense qu'aujourd'hui c'est un sujet qui devrait être primordial aux yeux de tous, pour peut-être espérer encore sauver quelque-chose...
Mon projet est de réussir à financer la formation qui me permettra de me lancer légalement dans la réparation et le recyclage de vélos usagés.
On m'a souvent traité de radine pour ma tendance à récupérer tout ce qui est récupérable, mais aujourd'hui il devient une nécessité visible de lutter contre le gâchis.
Et si à mon niveau je peux éviter à certains objets, comme les vélos, de finir à la poubelle et leur donner une nouvelle vie, tout en utilisant ma passion pour les travaux manuels et le bricolage, alors je me lance.

Mais pour me lancer j'ai obligatoirement et légalement besoin de valider les compétences que j'ai acquises seules en suivant une formation (CQP Conseiller Technicien Cycle), car le fait de vendre des vélos entiers est une activité réglementée et je ne peux l'exercer légalement sans avoir valider cette formation.
Cette dernière, réalisable dans l'école ProFormat à Mulhouse et reconnue par l'Etat, coûte 2825€ TTC et s'étale sur 238 heures de cours + 4 mois d’expérience professionnelle en entreprise.

Je ne suis pas dupe, et sait pertinemment qu'un tel projet suscite moins l'engouement que le financement de tel ou tel jeu vidéo ou d'un véritable Hoverboard tout droit sorti de "Retour vers le futur"...
Mais je me dis que si ce genre de projet arrive à récolter des milliers, peut-être que le mien, le projet d'une vie, pourrait espérer récolter quelques centaines d'euros. Qui ne tente rien n'a rien. Et c'est malheureusement ma seule solution pour financer cette formation et accomplir mon rêve: ouvrir mon propre atelier de récupération/recyclage/réparation de vieux vélos à Strasbourg.


De plus amples détails sur moi, mon parcours et mon projet :


Je m'appelle Stéphanie et vais bientôt avoir 25 ans.

Si vous vivez à Strasbourg, vous avez sûrement déjà dû me croiser. Jusqu'à début juillet, je distribuais chaque matin le journal gratuit MetroNews.
Cela faisait 7 ans que je distribuais chaque matin des journaux gratuits. J'ai travaillé pour chacun des trois grands quotidiens gratuits de France et ai été en poste à la plupart des arrêts de trams strasbourgeois durant ces 7 années.

En 2013 j'ai lancé une auto-entreprise sous forme de site web de vente de T-shirts sérigraphiés, dont le faible chiffre d'affaire me permet tout juste depuis, combiné au salaire de mon temps partiel de distributrice de journaux gratuits, de payer mon loyer et les frais inhérents à une vie modeste et peu dépensière.

Le 3 juillet MetroNews a décidé d'arrêter sa version papier. Et comme des centaines de colporteurs en France, je me retrouve en plein plan social, dans l'attente d'un licenciement économique qui surviendra dans très peu de temps.

Sans travail donc, mis à part mon auto-entreprise, j'ai donc vite décidé de me retourner et de chercher une activité de remplacement.

Etant très manuelle, je me suis naturellement tournée vers du bricolage. Des petites réparations en tout genre, de la sculpture sur bois, ... Et je suis tombée sur un vieux vélo rouillé qu'un de mes voisins avait mis dans la rue pour le faire enlever par le service des objets encombrants. 
Ce pauvre vélo était destiné à la déchetterie.

Ma nature économe pointa le bout de son nez et me souffla d'emporter le vélo chez moi pour lui redonner une seconde vie.

Je l'ai donc démonté, nettoyé, dérouillé et entièrement réparé. Et je me suis dit que j'avais trouvé ma voie.
Réparer de vieux vélos destinés à être jeté, voilà qui me motivait !

J'ai une conscience écologique assez présente et tandis que certains achètent et jettent à tout va, j'ai toujours été adepte de la récup' et de la réparation ou du recyclage.
Je ne supporte pas le gâchis et fais tout pour l'éviter.

L'idée de récupérer de vieux vélos hors d'usage et de leur redonner une nouvelle vie m'a donc d'emblée séduite et je m'y suis lancée corps et âme.

J'ai passé des annonces pour racheter à très bas prix des vélos et des pièces de vélos dont on voulait se débarrasser, et j'en ai refait des "neufs" en parfait état de marche.

J'ai d'abord offert ces vélos à des amis, des voisins. Et je me suis dit qu'il serait peut-être judicieux dans ma situation de déclarer cette activité pour pouvoir en tirer un peu d'argent.

Mais le problème est là : c'est une profession réglementée; en France, pour exercer le métier de réparateur/vendeur de vélos, il faut obligatoirement effectuer une formation dans le domaine.
Cette formation existe en Alsace: à Mulhouse, à l'école ProFormat.
Mais cette formation coûte 2825€ TTC.
Et je ne réussirai malheureusement jamais à réunir cette somme.

Etant donné que je ne travaillais qu'en temps partiel, j'ai accumulé à peine 24 heures de DIF (pour 238 heures de formation), et suite à plusieurs rendez-vous avec ma conseillère, j'ai appris que Pôle Emploi ne financera pas un sous de cette formation...

En utilisant tous mes DIF, il me manquera 2541€ pour payer cette formation.
C'est plus que ce que je gagnais en 5 mois jusqu'à présent... Soit une somme impossible à réunir avant des années pour moi.

J'ai un idéal de vie et refuse de m'abrutir tous les jours durant à effectuer un travail qui ne me rend pas heureuse, de part sa nature mais surtout de part sa finalité. A ma petite échelle, j'aimerais que l'activité qui me prend la plupart de mon temps ait une finalité écologique, et non pas que commerciale ou financière.

Mon avenir se joue maintenant, et même si la voie que je choisis risque d'être compliquée, c'est un choix que je suis prête à faire.
Mon rêve serait d'ouvrir un atelier de réparation de vieux vélos à Strasbourg, de travailler le plus possible avec des éléments de récup', de ne rien acheter pour ne rien produire de neuf, simplement réutiliser ce que les gens jettent pour en faire quelque-chose de fonctionnel (et croyez-moi, les gens jettent de tout, un exemple tout bête: en ramassant depuis quelques années les vis, écrous et rondelles que je vois par terre et que j'ai trouvé dans les poubelle de mon immeuble, je me suis constituée un stock énorme de ces petits éléments de quincaillerie, qui servent tous les jours !).

J'ai besoin de vous pour accomplir ce rêve.
C'est le projet d'une vie. Et un simple Euro de votre part pourrait m'aider à le réaliser.

Merci d'avoir lu ceci jusqu'au bout. Mon but n'est pas de susciter de la pitié, mais de l'envie, l'envie de soutenir un projet qui vous plait, ou simplement qui vous a fait sourire.
Si c'est le cas n'hésitez pas à partager cette page et à suivre l'évolution -peut-être miraculeusement favorable, qui sait ?-   de ce projet qui me tient à cœur.


P.S. : Une dernière chose à préciser, vous ne trouverez sur mon projet aucune photo de moi, j'ai toujours veillé à ne pas me dévoiler sur Internet et tiens à continuer, les gens qui me connaissent me reconnaîtront et je pense qu'il n'y a pas de nécessité à ce que vous voyiez une photo de moi...

story:
GigaBook.com is a small and medium sized business tools platform.  Our goal is to provide your business with the tools it needs to grow. 

GigaBook.com currently offers the following services:

  • Online Appointment Scheduling 
  • Group or Class Booking
  • Client and Staff Reminders 
  • Business Dashboard
  • Mobile access to your info
  • Customizable Emails
  • Client lists
  • Customizable Book Site
  • Sync with Google Calendar
  • To Do Lists with Due Dates and Reminders
  • Confirm, Reschedule or Decline Appointments
  • Separate user logins
  • Booking Widgets for your existing website
  • Customized contact forms for your website
  • Print reports, calendars, schedules and other useful information
  • Import your existing client lists from Gmail, iPhone, Yahoo, Outlook
  • Set permission levels for users allowing or disallowing access to info

GigaBook.com can help you:

  • Schedule with Real-time Availability
  • Allow your website to work for you 24/7/365
  • Turning your website from static to transactional
  • Make your website your hardest working employee
  • Appeal to what your customers want
  • Attract a whole new set of customers based on increased use of technology
  • Take more appointments online
  • Grow at the speed of the internet
  • Turn page visits into real revenue by accepting appointments online
  • Activate the power of the internet
  • Turn availability and technology into income

Appointment Setting

  • GigaBook utilizes a cloud-based scheduling system
  • Make/View/Edit appointments from any device
  • Easy to access from any browser with a custom login per user
  • Accept online appointment requests on the go


Client and Staff Reminders

  • Send email or text notifications/reminders to staff and clients
  • Send or receive notifications when new appointments are made
  • Send reminder text/email notifications as the appointment gets closer
  • Customize your notifications to fit your business and client’s needs
  • Create custom branded emails
  • Customize the content of your text messages
  • Preset client and staff reminder defaults and automate the whole process

Customize and Brand Your Emails, Notifications and Reminders


To Do List

  • Use To-Do Lists to increase productivity 
  • Delegate or receive to-do tasks from co-workers
  • Set Reminders and Due Dates that integrate into your calendar
  • GigaBook automatically creates a To-Do List folder for each user added
  • Notify Employees or Co-workers about newly added items
  • Easily add and remove new items from any device
  • Organize items by importance level and due date


Gigabook Syncs with your Google Calendar

GigaBook offers the ability to sync between your Google calendar and your GigaBook calendar. This sync keeps the flow of information updating between the two different platforms without the need to manually update both.

If you are already using Google Calendar you can import your existing schedule into your new GigaBook account right way.  


Business Dashboard

  • View all upcoming and incoming appointments, events and to-do items
  • Utilize your dashboard as a snapshot or nerve center of your business
  • Quickly add new appointments, to-do items or navigate to various places
  • Monitor all account activity and historical data
  • Create your own customized view


Client List

  • View all the clients for your business in one consolidated list that is easily sortable and searchable
  • Customize the type of information that your business collects about each client
  • Email directly to your clients using customizable templates for promotional offers or direct correspondence
  • Send bulk emails to your entire client list
  • Download your client list into PDF, CSV, or Microsoft Excel compatible files for the most convenient ways to manage your clients


Responsive Design

GigaBook utilizes a responsive layout to optimize the view based on any device that might be used. GigaBook's responsive layout will change sizes to automatically detect whether you are using a computer, tablet or phone adjusting the view accordingly.



Booking Widgets for your website

  • Allow customers to book appointments via your current website
  • Turn your website into a transactional site, one that works for your 24/7
  • Use real time availability and avoid double bookings
  • Easily make changes to your widget through your GigaBook Account


Group or Class Booking

  • Schedule Group or Class Bookings through your website
  • Create minimum and maximum group/class limits
  • Send notifications or updates to attendees
  • Receive notifications when attendees sign up


Customizable Booking Site
  • If you don't have a website create your own on our site!
  • Take bookings immediately 
  • List your services, policies and collect contact information
  • Invite your clients or prospects to visit as you add them



Lifetime Legacy Memberships

We are offering a very limited amount of lifetime memberships during this campaign.  Legacy members get a lifetime pass.  If your business grows and you want to upgrade your legacy membership later you will only be responsible for the price difference between where you start and where you upgrade to.  If you remain at the account level you choose now then you will never be billed again!  We will not be offering this again so don't wait to long! 
***Legacy Memberships are Non-Transferable

Get Sizable Discounts for 1 Year Memberships offered through this campaign!


Here are the perks offered during this campaign!


Who are you? Tell us more about your team!

GigaBook.com is located in Overland Park, Kansas which is part of the Kansas City Metropolitan area.  We have 9 Full Time Staff Members hard at work to bring you the best innovations possible.  Our platform was built over the course of 15 months while being used inside other small businesses associated with our now full time staff.  Therefore the model has been tested and built by people just like yourself!

Over the coming years our goal is to build a scalable product that can grow with your business.  While we have focused on providing our services for small and medium sized business first we do plan on continuing to create products that can scale upward and truly be used by businesses of any size.

Have Questions? 

Email support@gigabook.com





  Matt DeCoursey, President, Founder

Life long entrepreneur and business person.  I have an extensive history with business building and management.  My own experience has helped me work with my teammates at GigaBook to create a web platform that is and will continue to be useful for your business.  My goal is to provide services for you that help you focus on making money!


   Darrell Blackburn, Vice President

My educational background comes from Kelley School of Business at Indiana University - Indianapolis with a focus in business management and finance. In addition, my work experience consists of multiple positions at two different Fortune 500 companies. Through these great learning processes, I have realized my true passion resides with small-medium sized businesses. My work with GigaBook has given me an opportunity to immerse myself in a segment that I truly enjoy.


  Meghan Flavin, Sales and Product Manager

I have been in and around entrepreneurs my whole life, and truly enjoy the passion and pride that it requires. I come to GigaBook with a myriad of different life and work experiences, most recently as a regional representative for OpenTable. Prior to OpenTable, I owned and operated a consulting firm, helping small businesses fill the gaps in efficiency while maintaining profitability. Life has come full circle as I am truly at home talking about the different aspects of the GigaBook platform.


    John Berman, VP of Web Development

I'm proud to be a member of the Gigabook team. My past experience ranges from online accounting systems to virtual world gaming sites for kids. I have a highly diversified skillset, aptitude and eagerness to learn, strong communication skills and a genuine commitment to quality and customer satisfaction. My professional objective is to bridge the gap between graphic designer and software engineer in order to provide functionally attractive user experiences.


What Kind of Businesses Could Use GigaBook

GigaBook is customizable for your particular needs is not geared toward any one segment of the population, but we see it being very useful for:

  • Salon Services
  • Fitness Facilities 
  • Trainers
  • Yoga Instructors or Classes
  • Small business resource centers
  • Legal/Attorney
  • Realtors
  • Pet Related: Vets, Clinics, Groomers, Pet Sitters, Dog Walkers
  • Human Resources
  • Churches
  • Vehicle Repair or Maintenance
  • Childcare
  • Education
  • Fashion
  • Professional Associations
  • Art Galleries/Studios
  • Acupuncturists
  • Advisors
  • Driving Schools
  • Tanning Services
  • Nail Salons
  • Tattoo Studios
  • House Cleaning Services
  • Clothing Alterations
  • Boutique Clothiers
  • Photography Studio
  • Photography (Independent)
  • Lessons/Tutoring (Education/Learning Centers)
  • Franchises
  • Lawn & Garden
  • Independent Contractors
  • Exterminators
  • Repair Services
  • Roofing
  • Construction
  • Home Repair
  • Optometry
  • Orthodontics/Dentist
  • Chiropractor
  • Massage Therapy
  • Maker’s Spaces or Co-Working Spaces
  • Department Heads/Chairs to use within their smaller group
  • Project Management
  • Consultants
  • Any business that keeps a client or staff schedule

What features are you adding soon?


The website and its core services and functions are currently online and ready to use.  Therefore you don't have to wait to utilize your new membership.

GigaBook.com is currently building a number of various features and benefits for its users.  Our goal is to continue creating innovative and useful features that help you run your business more profitably and efficiently.

Upcoming Site Features

  • Waiting list notification
  • Full Website Packages
  • Project Management Tools
  • Payment processing options
  • Improvements on all existing functions
story_txt:
GigaBook.com is a small and medium sized business tools platform.  Our goal is to provide your business with the tools it needs to grow. GigaBook.com currently offers the following services:

Online Appointment Scheduling 


Group or Class Booking


Client and Staff Reminders 


Business Dashboard


Mobile access to your info


Customizable Emails


Client lists


Customizable Book Site


Sync with Google Calendar


To Do Lists with Due Dates and Reminders


Confirm, Reschedule or Decline Appointments


Separate user logins


Booking Widgets for your existing website


Customized contact forms for your website


Print reports, calendars, schedules and other useful information


Import your existing client lists from Gmail, iPhone, Yahoo, Outlook


Set permission levels for users allowing or disallowing access to info

GigaBook.com can help you:
Schedule with Real-time Availability
Allow your website to work for you 24/7/365
Turning your website from static to transactional
Make your website your hardest working employee
Appeal to what your customers want
Attract a whole new set of customers based on increased use of technology
Take more appointments online
Grow at the speed of the internet
Turn page visits into real revenue by accepting appointments online
Activate the power of the internet
Turn availability and technology into income


Appointment Setting
GigaBook utilizes a cloud-based scheduling system
Make/View/Edit appointments from any device
Easy to access from any browser with a custom login per user
Accept online appointment requests on the go







Client and Staff Reminders


Send email or text notifications/reminders to staff and clients
Send or receive notifications when new appointments are made
Send reminder text/email notifications as the appointment gets closer
Customize your notifications to fit your business and client’s needs
Create custom branded emails
Customize the content of your text messages
Preset client and staff reminder defaults and automate the whole process


Customize and Brand Your Emails, Notifications and Reminders





To Do List


Use To-Do Lists to increase productivity 
Delegate or receive to-do tasks from co-workers
Set Reminders and Due Dates that integrate into your calendar
GigaBook automatically creates a To-Do List folder for each user added
Notify Employees or Co-workers about newly added items
Easily add and remove new items from any device
Organize items by importance level and due date








Gigabook Syncs with your Google Calendar
GigaBook offers the ability to sync between your Google calendar and your GigaBook calendar. This
sync keeps the flow of information updating between the two different platforms
without the need to manually update both.
If you are already using Google Calendar you can import your existing schedule into your new GigaBook account right way.  




Business Dashboard


View all upcoming and incoming appointments, events and to-do items
Utilize your dashboard as a snapshot or nerve center of your business
Quickly add new appointments, to-do items or navigate to various places
Monitor all account activity and historical data
Create your own customized view









Client List


View all the clients for your business in one consolidated list that is easily sortable and searchable
Customize the type of information that your business collects about each client
Email directly to your clients using customizable templates for promotional offers or direct correspondence
Send bulk emails to your entire client list
Download your client list into PDF, CSV, or Microsoft Excel compatible files for the most convenient ways to manage your clients








Responsive Design
GigaBook utilizes a responsive layout to optimize the view based on any device that might be used. GigaBook's responsive layout will change sizes
to automatically detect whether you are using a computer, tablet or phone adjusting the view accordingly.




Booking Widgets for your website

Allow customers to book appointments via your current website
Turn your website into a transactional site, one that works for your 24/7
Use real time availability and avoid double bookings
Easily make changes to your widget through your GigaBook Account




Group or Class Booking


Schedule Group or Class Bookings through your website
Create minimum and maximum group/class limits
Send notifications or updates to attendees
Receive notifications when attendees sign up





Customizable Booking Site


If you don't have a website create your own on our site!


Take bookings immediately 

List your services, policies and collect contact information
Invite your clients or prospects to visit as you add them






Lifetime Legacy MembershipsWe are offering a very limited amount of lifetime memberships during this campaign.  Legacy members get a lifetime pass.  If your business grows and you want to upgrade your legacy membership later you will only be responsible for the price difference between where you start and where you upgrade to.  If you remain at the account level you choose now then you will never be billed again!  We will not be offering this again so don't wait to long! ***Legacy Memberships are Non-Transferable
Get Sizable Discounts for 1 Year Memberships offered through this campaign!

Here are the perks offered during this campaign!

GigaBook.com is located in Overland Park, Kansas which is part of the Kansas City Metropolitan area.  We have 9 Full Time Staff Members hard at work to bring you the best innovations possible.  Our platform was built over the course of 15 months while being used inside other small businesses associated with our now full time staff.  Therefore the model has been tested and built by people just like yourself!Over the coming years our goal is to build a scalable product that can grow with your business.  While we have focused on providing our services for small and medium sized business first we do plan on continuing to create products that can scale upward and truly be used by businesses of any size.Have Questions? Email support@gigabook.com  Matt DeCoursey, President, FounderLife long entrepreneur and business person.  I have an extensive history with business building and management.  My own experience has helped me work with my teammates at GigaBook to create a web platform that is and will continue to be useful for your business.  My goal is to provide services for you that help you focus on making money!   Darrell Blackburn, Vice PresidentMy educational background comes from Kelley School of Business at Indiana University - Indianapolis with a focus in business management and finance.
