story:
My signature "Golden Butter Rum & Dark Mocha"
Flavored Cordial Cherries

What's a Cordial?

Much more than simple chocolate covered cherries...
They're The World’s Finest Hand Crafted Cordial Cherries!

My cordials are juicy marinated cherries enrobed in smooth & creamy ganache’s that are flavored with the essence of sweet quality liqueurs and then hand-dipped in layers of decadent chocolate. Note: liqueurs are for flavorings only and retain no alcohol content since it is burned off during the infusion process.

~~~

What's Cherry Bomb Café?

"It's an internet café & coffee shop combined with a juice & smoothie bar combined with an entertaining chocolate fountain bar."

~~~

A big Texas "Howdy" to all the chocolate lovers of the world!

Imagine handing a rose made of chocolate to your fiancé with the words, “Will you marry me?” delicately printed in gold on one of the pedals. And on the inside is a strawberry enrobed in a delicious cheesecake ganache. Well, dream no more! Cherry Bomb Café will bring you this and many more creative and original ideas that you’ve probably never seen before.

My name is Clyde Allen, or so that’s what my mom would call me when I was in trouble as a youngster. I’ve been in the restaurant business for the last 25 years. As an artist and entrepreneur, it was only a natural progression for me to become a chocolatier. After all, food IS art and if I didn’t learn to “create” something in that amount of time then I just wasn’t paying attention.

So, what is Cherry Bomb Café? It's an internet café & coffee shop combined with a juice & smoothie bar combined with an entertaining chocolate fountain bar.

Now, imagine a chocolate fountain bar laid out in a buffet style fashion where people can watch roasted cocoa beans & nibs getting crushed in a conching machine which turns it into a chocolate liqueur and then they’ll see their favorite truffles being made right before their eyes by a skilled chocolate artisan. Additionally, there'll be a full juice and smoothie bar because I also specialize in fruit bouquets (see below), chocolate dipped fruit, juices, smoothies . . . you get the picture. And what great hangout, especially in Austin, is whole without an internet café style setting complete with coffees, pastries, soups & sandwiches?

Cherry Bomb Café will be a place in Austin TX where people can kick back have a coffee or tea, good eats and some really unique treats. If you think an internet café & coffee shop combined with a juice & smoothie bar combined with a chocolate fountain bar is “weird” then you clearly haven’t been to Austin TX yet. We welcome you soon!

Goals

Of course, top priority is to create magnificent original foods & drinks for you and your loved ones but people keep asking begging me to find a way to ship my cordial creations. Therefore, my main goal is to develop shipping methods that allow us to ship these creations out to wherever you are. To do that I have developed my own proprietary packaging for my products because they are very fragile. Also, I need my own commercial space in which to employ other talented chocolate artisans to create and fulfill these tasty treats for you. This is how Cherry Bomb Café will come to life.

In other words, for Cherry Bomb Café to come to full fruition I need good folks like yourself to choose one (or many) of my awesome perks above & to the right and then click away.

Please keep in mind - I believe that Values-Based Leadership by supporting other great causes is crucial to growing one's own endeavors. Therefore, my charity of choice is the “Guide Dogs for the Blind” organization and I will be donating 3% of my portion of the funds to “Guide Dogs for the Blind”. I will also continue to make generous donations to them for as long as I breathe.

Here’s an approximate breakdown of what the funds will go towards in the intended order of disbursement:

  • 5% = of the gross number automatically goes to Indiegogo.
  • 3% = of the net remainder will go to “Guide Dogs for the Blind” .
  • $6K = Inventory Supplies - include all kitchen tools & utensils, serving, delivery & shipping containers, cleaning supplies and food products. I already have over $6K worth of inventory supplies for running my day to day chocolate and fruit arrangement business which I currently run from a leased 3rd party kitchen.
  • $20K = Projected Commercial Startup Rent, Utilities, Legal & Insurance.
  • $25K = Projected Startup Payroll.
  • $10K = Marketing, Promotion & Branding.
  • $10K-$45K = Equipment - includes walk-in refrigerator/freezer, undercounter refrigerator, display countertop fridges, ice machine, sinks, juicers & blenders, chocolate machines: bean roasting (drum) oven, cocoa butter press, conching (milling) machine, tempering table, confectionary drum pan, enrober, fountains, and Point of Sale System. I already own about $6K worth of restaurant equipment (steel tables, shelving, refrigerator cabinets, 3 chocolate tempering machines, a conveyor oven, a dough rolling machine, and a giant stand mixer).
  • $45K = Commercial Space Retrofit - includes design consultation, dining tables & chairs, coffee lounge furniture, counter tops, signage, permits, contractors, freight, and installations.

Now you may be scratching your head thinking that this all seems to add up to more than what my goal is and you’d be right. That’s because this is my first crowdfund campaign and I’ve read from many sources that anything over $10K rarely gets funded. My real number is closer to $150K-$200K to run everything top-notch. Therefore, I’m asking for the bare-bones minimum (seed capital) to get into my own commercial space from which to develop a successful & robust shipping model and then I’ll apply for a Small Business Loan with a few months of sales growth to show. Or I may run an additional campaign, depending on how successful this one is. Also, this campaign is VERY short (only 12 days total) because I’m trying to capture the expansive Valentine’s Day crowd which is the specific target demographic to this kind of concept. Therefore, I’ve earmarked this campaign to be “InDemand” so that people can continuously contribute to the growth of Cherry Bomb Café but. Please keep in mind, though, that we still have to reach the total campaign goal of $35K in order for the "InDemand" option to take effect after the campaign ends in 12 days.

Future Goals

As this concept grows I will inevitably branch out to additional locations and perhaps even eventually franchise. To foster this kind of growth I will focus on large events such as weddings, corporate events, festivals and trade shows. Having said that, I plan to host this year and every year after, the “Austin Chocolate Festival” which was previously hosted by my own mentor.

That one has always been a great show! :) Thanks Steven!

Please Share!

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Please help get the word out and make some noise about my campaign.
  • Please use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it. I'll keep everyone updated as things progress. Thanks in advance for any time and attention you may give this.

Cordially yours,

Clyde Allen DuBose

P.S.  You may have noticed that my logo at the top of this page doesn't say "Cherry Bomb Café". That's because "Cordial Creations" is the name of the catering style concept that I currently run it as. I will still use the same logo but just change the lettering to read "Cherry Bomb Café". You can read more about my cordial beginnings here ~ CherryBombCafe.com ~ where you can also check out my proposed full menu. Or use the links below to find me.

F.Y.I. You can already order some items at CordialCreations.com (currently for delivery in the Austin area only). I apologize to those who don’t live in the Austin area but that is what this whole campaign is about – so that I may develop a model to enable me, with the help of employees, to efficiently ship to you wherever you are. Thanks for your contributions in advance and I hope to make it a great holiday for everyone :)

UPDATE: Mon. Feb. 3, 2016
I just revamped my logo! :)

Connect to me on Facebook and Twitter!
story_txt:
My signature "Golden Butter Rum & Dark Mocha"

Flavored Cordial Cherries
What's a Cordial?

Much more than simple chocolate covered
cherries... 
They're The World’s Finest Hand Crafted Cordial Cherries!

My cordials are juicy marinated cherries enrobed in smooth & creamy ganache’s
that are flavored with the essence of sweet quality liqueurs and then
hand-dipped in layers of decadent chocolate. Note: liqueurs are for flavorings only and retain no alcohol content since it is burned off during the infusion process.

 ~~~What's Cherry Bomb Café?

"It's an internet café & coffee shop combined with a juice & smoothie bar combined with an entertaining chocolate fountain bar."
~~~
A big Texas "Howdy" to all the chocolate lovers
of the world!Imagine handing a rose made of
chocolate to your fiancé with the words, “Will you marry me?” delicately printed
in gold on one of the pedals. And on the inside is a strawberry enrobed in a
delicious cheesecake ganache. Well, dream no more! Cherry Bomb Café will bring
you this and many more creative and original ideas that you’ve probably never
seen before.
My name is Clyde Allen, or so that’s
what my mom would call me when I was in trouble as a youngster. I’ve been in
the restaurant business for the last 25 years. As an artist and entrepreneur,
it was only a natural progression for me to become a chocolatier. After all,
food IS art and if I didn’t learn to “create” something in that amount of time
then I just wasn’t paying attention.
So, what is Cherry Bomb Café? It's an internet café & coffee shop combined with a juice & smoothie bar combined with an entertaining chocolate fountain bar. Now, imagine a chocolate fountain bar
laid out in a buffet style fashion where people can watch roasted cocoa beans
& nibs getting crushed in a conching machine which turns it into a chocolate liqueur
and then they’ll see their favorite truffles being made right before their eyes
by a skilled chocolate artisan. Additionally, there'll be a full juice and
smoothie bar because I also specialize in fruit bouquets (see below), chocolate
dipped fruit, juices, smoothies . . . you get the picture. And what great
hangout, especially in Austin, is whole without an internet café style setting
complete with coffees, pastries, soups & sandwiches?Cherry Bomb Café will be a place in Austin TX where people can kick back have a coffee or tea, good
eats and some really unique treats. If you think an internet café & coffee shop combined with a juice & smoothie bar combined with a chocolate fountain bar is “weird” then you clearly haven’t been to
Austin TX yet. We welcome you soon! 
Goals 
Of course, top priority is to create
magnificent original foods & drinks for you and your loved ones but people keep asking
begging me to find a way to ship my cordial creations. Therefore, my main goal
is to develop shipping methods that allow us to ship these creations out to wherever
you are. To do that I have developed my own proprietary packaging for my
products because they are very fragile. Also, I need my own commercial space in
which to employ other talented chocolate artisans to create and fulfill these tasty treats for you. This is how Cherry Bomb Café will come to life.
In other words, for
Cherry Bomb Café to come to full fruition I need good folks like yourself to
choose one (or many) of my awesome perks above & to the right and then click away.
Please keep in mind - I believe that Values-Based
Leadership by supporting other great causes is crucial to growing one's own
endeavors. Therefore, my charity of choice is the “Guide Dogs for the Blind” organization and I will be donating 3% of my portion of the funds to “Guide Dogs for the Blind”. I will also continue to make generous donations to them for as long as I breathe.

Here’s an approximate breakdown of what the funds will go towards in the
intended order of disbursement:

5% = of the gross number automatically goes to Indiegogo.
3% = of the net remainder will go to “Guide Dogs for the Blind” .
$6K = Inventory
     Supplies - include all kitchen tools & utensils, serving, delivery
     & shipping containers, cleaning supplies and food products. I already
     have over $6K worth of inventory supplies for running my
      day to day chocolate and fruit arrangement business which I currently run from a
     leased 3rd party kitchen.
$20K =
     Projected Commercial Startup Rent, Utilities, Legal & Insurance.
$25K = Projected
     Startup Payroll. 
$10K =
     Marketing, Promotion & Branding.
$10K-$45K = Equipment
     - includes walk-in refrigerator/freezer, undercounter refrigerator,
 display countertop fridges,
     ice machine, sinks, juicers & blenders, chocolate machines: 
bean roasting (drum) oven, cocoa butter press, conching (milling) 
machine, tempering table, confectionary drum pan, enrober, fountains, 
and Point of Sale System. I already own about
     $6K worth of restaurant equipment (steel tables, shelving, 
refrigerator
     cabinets, 3 chocolate tempering machines, a conveyor oven, a dough 
rolling
     machine, and a giant stand mixer).
$45K = Commercial
     Space Retrofit - includes design consultation, dining tables & chairs,
     coffee lounge furniture, counter tops, signage, permits, contractors, freight, and installations.



Now
you may be scratching your head thinking that this all seems to add up to more
than what my goal is and you’d be right. That’s because this is my first
crowdfund campaign and I’ve read from many sources that anything over $10K rarely
gets funded. My real number is closer to $150K-$200K to run everything top-notch. Therefore, I’m asking for the
bare-bones minimum (seed capital) to get into my own commercial space from
which to develop a successful & robust shipping model and then I’ll apply
for a Small Business Loan with a few months of sales growth to show. Or I may
run an additional campaign, depending on how successful this one is. Also, this campaign is VERY short (only 12 days
total) because I’m trying to capture the expansive Valentine’s Day crowd which
is the specific target demographic to this kind of concept. Therefore, I’ve 
earmarked this campaign to be “InDemand” so that people can continuously contribute
to the growth of Cherry Bomb Café but. Please keep in mind, though, that we still have to reach the total campaign goal of $35K in order for the "InDemand" option to take effect after the campaign ends in 12 days.   Future Goals  
As this concept grows I will
inevitably branch out to additional locations and perhaps even eventually franchise.
To foster this kind of growth I will focus on large events such as weddings,
corporate events, festivals and trade shows. Having said that, I plan to host this
year and every year after, the “Austin Chocolate Festival” which was
previously hosted by my own mentor. 
That one has always been a great show! :) Thanks Steven!   Please Share!
 Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:  Please help get the word out and make some noise about my campaign. Please use the Indiegogo share tools!   And that's all there is to it. I'll keep everyone updated as things progress. Thanks in advance for any time and attention you may give this.Cordially yours,Clyde Allen DuBose

P.S.  You may have noticed that my logo at the top of this page doesn't say "Cherry Bomb Café". That's because "Cordial Creations" is the name of the catering style concept that I currently run it as. I will still use the same logo but just change the lettering to read "Cherry Bomb Café". You can read more about my cordial beginnings here ~ CherryBombCafe.com ~ where you can also check out my
proposed full menu. Or use the links below to find me.F.Y.I. You can already order
some items at CordialCreations.com (currently for delivery in the
Austin area only). I apologize to those who don’t live in the Austin area but
that is what this whole campaign is about – so that I may develop a model to
enable me, with the help of employees, to efficiently ship to you wherever you
are. Thanks for your contributions in advance and I hope to make it a great
holiday for everyone :)UPDATE: Mon. Feb. 3, 2016I just revamped my logo! :)Connect to me on Facebook and Twitter!

story:
About this project


RefCircle – A Job Network. Idea is to create a connected world of employees from different organizations and different part of the world. Many times, we ask our friends about the job in their organization. We hardly get to know about the opportunities in our friends circle. Studies and various researches show that internal job referrals increase the possibility of landing a job by 10 times. At the same time employees struggle to find a profile or friend to refer them because they may not be aware if someone is looking for a change or not. This is the idea behind RefCircle to provide a platform for genuine job referrals through the job networking. Here job seekers can browse through the available jobs for referral and get the referrals. Referrer gets the referral bonus so it makes RefCircle a win-win for everyone.

These days we have experienced how challenging job market has become. It makes difficult for us to find a suitable job in difficult time so RefCircle can help us connect with someone far away or next door and you can extend help to someone in need of job or for someone looking for change.

Our logo resembles our RefCircle principle of a big circle of peoples around the world. It is our dream to make a family of employees with different backgrounds.

Services in RefCircle

1.  Find a Job to get the referral

2.  Post a Job to get profiles

We have launched RefCircle web application with India and USA as available locations and we are looking to expand it across globe so that we can connect everyone from all over the world.

HOW IT WORKS

Sign up is very easy. Just sign up with your email ID, password and a unique user name. (We have plan to integrate login or sign up options with Facebook, google and twitter)

Then you can maintain a profile with your resume if you are looking for a job if not then you can skip resume and help someone.

RefCIrcle provides features as below.

If you are a job seeker

You can search for a job with keywords, skills or location and ask for refer me. Job referrer will receive an email that you have requested for referral.

If you are a referrer

If you see a position available in your organization and if you need profiles to refer for that position then post a job with all the details.

Then wait for someone to request for referral.

Once you receive a ‘Refer Me’ request then download resume from jobs dashboard. You can check profile or talk to requestor (if you want to) to ensure that profile matches with the job role. If profile matches then refer him and mark as referred in jobs dashboard so that requestor will be intimated through email about successful referral. Now wait for the hiring process to get over and you have a chance to earn referral bonus as per your organization’s policy.


Goal

Our goal is to create a big circle of employees from different backgrounds to help each other. We have made initial investments and developed web application www.RefCircle.com on cloud (AWS) to provide better performance, availability, scalability and security of our application.

Now we are looking to build more features and to build mobile applications on iOS, and Android platforms as well. We will need funding of approx. $25000 to manage costs, the server fees (AWS), development of mobile apps, enhancement of features e.g. expand to other countries, social and online advertisements to increase awareness about RefCircle, real time chat or conversation, featured jobs, premium jobs.

Please help us today to help you in future

You can help us by donating or by spreading the word via social media! Follow us on Facebook share our story on your own platform, blog or other social media sites to help make the RefCircle campaign a success.

Join us today to build a connected world of employees!
Job network can help to get a genuine job through the referral.

Risks and challenges

Our team has already built MVP with basic features. Now team is working hard to make sure that we keep on improving no matter how much funding we receive, we will continue to work with our users. We have built application so that we can show what we are planning to achieve and your support to RefCircle campaign will help us reach our target quickly.

With your help, we will complete the website and mobile app as we envision for the future of www.RefCircle.com. 


We are looking to make RefCircle campaign a success with your support and to build a family (Circle) of employees. Request for your support and any contribution which you can make towards RefCircle.


Thank you for all the support! We are excited to take the next step with you.

story:
Short Summary

My name is Lyall and I'm an Online Developer, formerly an Account Manager. Using the wealth of experience I have acquired in both of these areas I have single-handedly built a brand and need your help to launch it! Earlier this year I decided to start this project in my spare time (evenings and weekends), and I have been focused on it ever since.
I have already:
  • Developed a fully bespoke e-commerce website that is ready to take orders, incorporating a loyalty reward scheme and many other features (a site like mine would normally cost thousands to develop).
  • Designed the logo, product packaging and all product labels (again, doing all the design myself).
  • Sourced a supplier and approved samples of my products and packaging.
  • Received only positive feedback from product testers 
Your contribution will make this project progress from an empty store to an active brand that I can grow to it's full potential. 10% of all profits will be donated to charity.

What I Need

Basically everything is ready, but I need stock! Of the £3,000 needed, £2,655 is to order stock covering 20 flavours in three nicotine strengths, two of the three electronic cigarettes types and a smattering of spares and accessories. 

It is my intention to stock over 100 flavours but I will start with 20 and use sales revenue to expand the range over time. However, if I raise more than £3,000 I will start with a wider range. The rest of the money will go toward additional modules for the site (cart reminder emails etc. that need to be purchased) and marketing materials.

If I don't reach my entire goal I will order as much stock as I can with what has been raised.

Impact

I saw the opportunity for a brand with impact, one that has low prices, high quality products and a logo that can be instantly recognised. My brand is professional yet lighthearted in it's approach. We're all adults after all.

Smoking is bad, and it kills loved ones. If I can create a brand that helps make vaping a more prevalent (maybe even more mainstream) and a more frequently used alternative to smoking, then I will have succeeded.

Risks & Challenges

There is always the small risk that I will be left with a fully stocked website and no customers. However I am a wizard online and I will spend every spare minute I have promoting my website. I have also had interest from an independent store who would be interested in stocking my products, although for the time being I am not looking at trade sales.

In 2011 I received my Certificate in Promotional Marketing from the IPM, and I have the knowledge required to effectively publicise the brand.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you don't contribute, please feel free to have a look at my site: http://suck.direct and have a play around. Please share this page, make some noise and get my brand up and running!

You can also use the Indiegogo share tools to help me!

story:
Tutorial:

Fandom Files is a new concept retail book, comic book, and art store. Especially art.  Specifically fan art. Our goal is to bring new and exciting worlds within reach of community which all ready happens to boast its own Comic Con and a healthy supportive nerdy community. We will host any number of events and activities including but not limited to gaming tournaments (Magic anyone?), cosplay competitions, book signings, artist signings, and demonstrations.

I’d love to say that this would better our whole community or the world but I can’t. This business will allow me to join my husband in supporting our family. We will source local and small scale artists as well as small businesses to help others thrive in their businesses as well.

On a personal note, this business is being opened by me and my husband.  I am a stay at home nerdtastic mom and my husband is a disabled veteran and public servant. We have 4 young children (ages 9-2) ranging from exceedingly nerdy to tough to tangle with. Our middle children were born with hearing loss which makes life more interesting, which has presented us with unique challenges and inspirations. This year I’m making them Blue Ear and Saphira (deaf superheros) costumes for Halloween!

Contributing to making this dream a reality may be small scale in relation to the world, but for my family and I this changes our world for the better in countless ways.

Crafting Recipe

As you might imagine, getting a store of any kind operational takes a bit of real effort and often a great deal of money. This is our budget as it stands at the moment. 

  • Website: $450 (this gets our website up and running for a whole year)

  • Licensing: $200 (this gets us all the licenses we need)

  • Getting Signs: $10,000 (this puts our logo in a lit box on the front and back of the building as well as removing the existing signs)

  • Location: $10,000 (covers the down payment and the first 3 months of rent)

  • Shelving: $5000 (fairly obvious I think, I can’t just pile all those wonderful books on the floor)

  • Furnishings: $8,000 (a proper book store needs big comfy chairs to wallow in, and tables to display goods or set a cup of coffee on as well as display cases for art and such fabulous things)

  • Stock: $30,000 (can’t open the store without stock on the shelves)

  • Marketing: $10,000 (got to get our name out there!!)

  • Point of Sales System: $500 (this allows us the use of an accounting and inventory system for a year)

  • Computer: $850 (for all the digital needs of a modern day business)

If we reach this goal we have an extended goal of $100,000 total so that we can add a small tea and coffee area to the shop. This would not be such a big addition but we’ll need to actually build a kitchen in our space and the majority of that cost will go there.  If we reach the point where this campaign succeeds to that extent, then we will post and updated budget with those details on it.

The Loot!!

A few of our perks, these are my favorites!

For a $5 contribution: A mention of thanks on our contributors wall which will be present both on our website and in our store. Video game tomb stones have always been one of my favorite little details, you pick your name and pithy epitaph and we put it on our walls!

For a $25 contribution: you receive an amazing t-shirt with our logo on it, and get a mention of thanks on our wall and website!

For a $100 contribution: you receive a mention on our wall and website, a logo sticker, a t-shirt, a choice of one ticket to one special event (book signing, artist meet and greets, demonstrations, etc), and an invitation to our Grand Opening which will be as close to a real comic con as I can make it!

For a $1,000 contribution: A Comic Con gift basket that will include 2 tickets to our local Comic Con, and tons of other nerdy goodies, your choice of 2 special event tickets, an invitation to our Grand Opening, plus a mention on our walls and 10% off on all in store purchases for a year.

For a $10,000 contribution: A party for you and your favorite 7 nerdy friends after hours in our store, an invitation to our Grand Opening, your choice of 4 special event tickets, a mention on our walls, and a 20% off on all in store purchases for a year. (Limited Quantities!)

If we don’t reach the goal immediately whatever has been gathered will go towards putting together a store, it will just take a little longer! All perks will be honored!

Who this quest reaches:

As I said before, I wish I could say that this project has an Earth shattering potential to improve the world but it doesn’t. What it does have is world altering potential for my family. When successful this business will give us independence. It will also give other small businesses and artists a chance to live their dreams.

By contributing to this project you contribute to a dream, a dream of independence and sharing our passions with others and bringing joy and wonder to our community.

Petty villains:

Our business is a simple one as retail businesses go, the most difficult problem we foresee is finding local artists that are interested in selling their work. Our local Comic Con will be an incomparable resource in finding locals that want to share their work with others, we will also be sourcing artists on platforms like Etsy and Deviant Art because they are amazing and experienced in sharing their art with the world.

Another difficulty we may face could be getting customers in the door, we will be using social networks such as Facebook and Twitter to really share ourselves and our business with the world, we will be attending the nearest Comic Cons to promote our store amongst a crowd that is our primary market, we will be blogging about the store, the merchandise, the art and artists, new products, and anything else that relates to our business, and we will also be holding events in our store (gaming tournaments, cosplay competitions, art and book signings, meet and greets, and art demonstrations to name a few).

We are nerds ourselves, my husband grew up playing Magic the Gathering and reading comics, I grew up with my nose buried in a book.  We met at a renaissance faire. We may not be hardcore nerds but we definitely fall within nerdom.

Side Quest:

Other ways to help! Sharing is caring, get our name out there as many ways and as often as you can.

Another way to contribute that could easily be equal or better than a financial contribution is sharing your art with us, or letting an artist know what we’re doing. We can’t sell art we don’t have, let them know we want to see their work!

reality may be small scale in relation to the world, but for my family and I
this changes our world for the better in countless ways.
Crafting Recipe 
As you might imagine, getting a
store of any kind operational takes a bit of real effort and often a great deal
of money. This is our budget as it stands at the moment.  

Website: $450 (this gets our website
up and running for a whole year)
Licensing: $200 (this gets us all
the licenses we need)
Getting Signs: $10,000 (this puts
our logo in a lit box on the front and back of the building as well as removing
the existing signs)
Location: $10,000 (covers the down
payment and the first 3 months of rent)
Shelving: $5000 (fairly obvious I
think, I can’t just pile all those wonderful books on the floor)
Furnishings: $8,000 (a proper book
store needs big comfy chairs to wallow in, and tables to display goods or set a
cup of coffee on as well as display cases for art and such fabulous things)
Stock: $30,000 (can’t open the store
without stock on the shelves)
Marketing: $10,000 (got to get our
name out there!!)
Point of Sales System: $500 (this
allows us the use of an accounting and inventory system for a year)
Computer: $850 (for all the digital
needs of a modern day business)

If we
reach this goal we have an extended goal of $100,000 total so that we can add a
small tea and coffee area to the shop. This would not be such a big addition
but we’ll need to actually build a kitchen in our space and the majority of
that cost will go there.  If we reach the
point where this campaign succeeds to that extent, then we will post and
updated budget with those details on it.
The
Loot!!
A few of
our perks, these are my favorites!
For a $5
contribution: A mention of thanks on our contributors wall which will be
present both on our website and in our store. Video game tomb stones have
always been one of my favorite little details, you pick your name and pithy
epitaph and we put it on our walls!
For a $25
contribution: you receive an amazing t-shirt with our logo on it, and get a
mention of thanks on our wall and website!
For a $100
contribution: you receive a mention on our wall and website, a logo sticker, a
t-shirt, a choice of one ticket to one special event (book signing, artist meet
and greets, demonstrations, etc), and an invitation to our Grand Opening which
will be as close to a real comic con as I can make it!
For a
$1,000 contribution: A Comic Con gift basket that will include 2 tickets to our
local Comic Con, and tons of other nerdy goodies, your choice of 2 special
event tickets, an invitation to our Grand Opening, plus a mention on our walls
and 10% off on all in store purchases for a year.
For a
$10,000 contribution: A party for you and your favorite 7 nerdy friends after
hours in our store, an invitation to our Grand Opening, your choice of 4
special event tickets, a mention on our walls, and a 20% off on all in store
purchases for a year. (Limited Quantities!) 
If we don’t
reach the goal immediately whatever has been gathered will go towards putting
together a store, it will just take a little longer! All perks will be honored!
Who
this quest reaches:
As I said before, I wish I could say
that this project has an Earth shattering potential to improve the world but it
doesn’t. What it does have is world altering potential for my family. When
successful this business will give us independence. It will also give other
small businesses and artists a chance to live their dreams. 
By contributing to this project you
contribute to a dream, a dream of independence and sharing our passions with
others and bringing joy and wonder to our community.
Petty
villains:
Our business is a simple one as retail
businesses go, the most difficult problem we foresee is finding local artists
that are interested in selling their work. Our local Comic Con will be an
incomparable resource in finding locals that want to share their work with
others, we will also be sourcing artists on platforms like Etsy and Deviant Art
because they are amazing and experienced in sharing their art with the world.
Another difficulty we may face could
be getting customers in the door, we will be using social networks such as
Facebook and Twitter to really share ourselves and our business with the world,
we will be attending the nearest Comic Cons to promote our store amongst a crowd
that is our primary market, we will be blogging about the store, the merchandise,
the art and artists, new products, and anything else that relates to our
business, and we will also be holding events in our store (gaming tournaments, cosplay
competitions, art and book signings, meet and greets, and art demonstrations to
name a few).
We are nerds ourselves, my husband
grew up playing Magic the Gathering and reading comics, I grew up with my nose
buried in a book.  We met at a renaissance
faire. We may not be hardcore nerds but we definitely fall within nerdom. 
Side
Quest:
Other ways
to help! Sharing is caring, get our name out there as many ways and as often as
you can.
Another way
to contribute that could easily be equal or better than a financial
contribution is sharing your art with us, or letting an artist know what we’re
doing. We can’t sell art we don’t have, let them know we want to see their
work!

story:
My name is Kilyane. I am an International student who has been living in Uganda for the past 3 years. Thousands of children need help in Uganda, Africa. This may sound cliché but it is actually happening. Mukono Fairway childcare is a boarding school located in the Mukono district of Uganda, directed by Pastor Salomon. This great man does his best to help over 400 children. My story with them started in 2014. I fell in love with this modest place and the children. They do not have enough money for a medicine supply, basic showers and toilets. They cant even afford sanitary pads for the 200 girls that they support. Something as simple as pads, yes. 

I worked a lot over those two years to raise money, finance, health check, etc .. However, it is not enough. I know that 500 children is nothing compared to the worlds population of children in needed alone Africa itself, but it has to start somewhere, it has to start at home. With the money I hope to raise through this page, my first goal is to set up a stable medicine supply and finance and install new decent showers and toilets. You don't know how crucial your help can be. 

A meal in Uganda is worth 1$, as much as you can donate is greatly appreciated.

story:
Please fund free Ability Reports

A spinal cord injury is one of the toughest disabilities a person can face... but it is not the end of the world! A happy life is possible even for wheelchair users. This is proven nearly* every day by many people, including mobility consultant Scott Darnell, who is a C-5/6 Quad.

* In all honestly, some days suck!

In his quest to help newly disabled individuals regain freedom and independence, mobility consultant Scott Darnell is aiming to prepare customized Ability Reports for at least 30 of them, all at no cost... thanks to you.

What We Need & What You Get

Ability Reports is a new service Scott is offering where he researches, writes, prepares and delivers qualified, highly detailed and personalized reports for newly disabled Recipients. In each case, the goal is potentially life-altering: Scott aims to allow each Recipient to regain his or her freedom - and reestablish independence.

To live independently himself, to access public transportation and even drive and operate his own vehicle over the past two decades, Scott has learned a lot – and he continues to advance his hands-on education every day.

Scott launched Ability Reports in 2015 based on constant communications with national leaders at the highest levels of the medical and vocational rehabilitation industries. These days, there are more than 12,000 new spinal cord injuries occurring each year in America, and many experts agree that Scott can have an extraordinary impact on those people’s lives. However, to earn referrals, he needs proof.  With your support, that will be established firmly and wonderfully.

This campaign’s perks add up simply and effectively: For every $255 raised, Scott will complete an Ability Report for a Recipient. If we meet our entire goal, at least 30 Recipients will receive the benefits of the potentially life-altering personalized education Scott will give them.

As this campaign progresses, we will seize every opportunity to share the impact we’re making together. Each Recipient will know who funded their Report, and if all goes well, we will have much to celebrate together starting soon.

Between Scott and his growing crowd of fans and supporters, we’ve all seen that the options for disabled people tend to fade away when they don’t start going-to-bat for themselves.

Following the greatest challenges of their lives, it will be Scott’s privilege to give our Recipients vital information they can use to overcome catastrophe and get back on track.

Understanding the Impact

In recent years, the amount of acute care and rehabilitation provided for the newly disabled has plummeted dramatically. So naturally, it’s even harder to understand the options and make the key moves necessary to adjust and stabilize.

The education passed along through the personal Ability Report, and through the additional consulting time Scott includes for each Recipient, is proven, expertly sourced and personally verified. 

As an ambitious inventor and solutions provider, Scott has an impressive track-record for success, innovation and community service.

By funding this campaign, you are bringing his dreams for helping others to reality.

Risks & Challenges

We are very optimistic about the prospects for this campaign to generate bona-fide results for our Recipients, despite hurdles great and numerous.

. Recipients proceeding through their medical treatment processes are overwhelmed in every possible way. Often, their life situations are “compromised” before they know it.

. Families and friends of the newly disabled are usually also “in shock” and unsure of what they can do to help.

. Across the broad network of experts, practitioners, institutions, agencies, vendors and service providers where those-in-need turn for help, getting the answers necessary to progress can still be impossible. 

. Finally, we know it can take a long time to be in a position to use even the best advice. We are hoping to make an impact but understand it won't be easy!

With these and other considerations in mind, we respectfully invite you to learn more about Scott, and to help us validate his work:  Please Fund Free Ability Reports.

Other Ways You Can Help

Since Scott’s injury on June 29, 1991, he has been the hero of a dramatic story involving many loving friends and family members. He always appreciates his time with others. Please connect with him on Facebook and keep in-touch!

You’ll be our hero if you can also encourage others to visit the Ability Reports website at AnAbility.com, to learn more, and to consider funding free Ability Reports.

Thank you for joining us here and for sending in your questions.  Looking forward!

story:
Our dream is to do as much good as possible from farm to cup while providing, high quality, hand roasted, local coffee.   We ethically source beans from coffee farmers around the world, hand roast them in Ocean Beach California, and donate 50% of the proceeds back to local non-profit partners.  

We are raising money to take a small team down to Oaxaca to meet the farmers we are direct sourcing small lot coffee beans from.  We will also be installing water filtration systems with Ride4Water and assessing other community needs.  Our contacts in the country are Israel, who is the regional coffee representative of our partner organization Axiom Coffee Ventures, and Jeffery Simons, a local missionary in the community for over a decade.  Finally we will be filming a short documentary recapping our trip and telling the story of our mission. 

We are so grateful for your partnership in supporting our mission and making this dream a realty as we work towards making a difference in the lives of people here and across the world.  

Doing Good.. Farm to Cup.

OBbeans

Farm to Cup.OBbeans

story:
Bliss Box was founded by yours truly; Lauren Gamble.  


I'm an environmentalist who sometimes forgets to compost, an academic who watches Keeping up with the Kardashians, a friend who is sometimes selfish and a yogini who loves wine.

Now you may see everything I just stated as contradictory... however I don't. I'm a human being -  I falter. In these moments of faltering there are three things you cannot take away from me; my tribe (community), my ability to love myself (self-love), and my home (Canada REPRESENT). It is on this foundation that I have based Bliss Box.

Bliss Box became clear to me whilst talking to some friends of mine in a Yoga class in Ottawa, Canada. On one particularly stressful day, working in a job I didn't like, on the mend from a particularly nasty break-up, and being newly back in Canada-  a member of my tribe (yoga buddies) offered me a brand of Canadian essential oils designed to calm and ease tension. I had never heard of this brand but, it was amazing ! This beautiful gift snowballed within our tribe and on a weekly basis we would be sharing with each other new recipes and products that suited our life styles. In an ideal world, we would have time to go out and source these things ourselves, but when you surround yourself with likeminded people who aim to bring out the best in you they open your eyes to these wonderful things themselves. 

This is what Bliss Box aims to do - we want to make self-love and self-care easier for you by providing a service that brings bliss directly to your doorstep. We are always going to be searching for the best products and they will always be Canadian. 


In a nutshell: 

Bliss Box is a monthly subscription service that ships Canadian health and wellness products with a conscience directly to your door. Whether it be a vegan granola bar, a mala bracelet or an organic eye cream, we understand that it can be hard to shop mindfully in a world that is interested in getting the best deal. We also understand that we are impossibly hard on ourselves and that you can only love others as much as you love yourself- this is why we want you to receive a gift each month from you, to you. 

       


On a step-by-step description this is how it works: 

1). You will sign up to your monthly subscription option (annual contract, annual no contract, and single delivery).

2). Once signed up, you will immediately become a part of our monthly newsletter which will have guest writers on health and wellness as well as insider information and promotions  on the previous months box contents. On the tenth of every month Bliss Box will ship out our monthly box filled with health and wellness goodies from Canadian companies directly to your door. 

3). You take some guilt free time to sit and enjoy the beautiful box of bliss we have bestowed upon you. 

It's that simple ! 

In the name of good Karma, Bliss Box is not a completely profit driven endeavor . A part of your monthly subscription will go to Canadian charities that stand by our foundation of community and self-love. Look at that - by ordering Bliss Box you are supporting Canadian business AND helping Canadian charities.


This is what I need from you:

We have chosen to launch our subscription via Indiegogo as a way to mitigate the initial costs of starting a business. This startup gives us the opportunity to create mutually beneficial relationships with vendors across the country built on support  of a community of small Canadian businesses. In turn, we are using this platform as a way of pre-selling Bliss Box to you and offering you significant initial incentives for helping us on our way. 

We really want to create a big'ol community that supports people who are doing what they love and offers people space to love themselves and therefore others... 

Please note that ALL contributions will be met and delivered upon ! 


Other ways you can help...

We understand that sometimes it's just not in the realm of possibility to to contribute but if you like what we are doing and want to lend your support in other ways - please feel free to tell your friends about us and like us on all our social media outlets. 

    https://www.facebook.com/Bliss-Box-887365374688765/

    https://instagram.com/blissboxcanada/ 

  https://twitter.com/blissboxcanada  

With love and good karma, 

Lauren

Lauren

story:
WHO ARE WE?

My name is Miroslav and I’m the owner and founder of Smart Office, the very first Coworking space in Serbia. I'm also a dreamer who doesn't have much time for sleep, a serial entrepreneur, travel and gastronomad, a guy who can not stay still for one minute. Physically or mentally! It's probably because I'm a Gemini, so of course, for me, it's all about the people. Three and a half years ago, I decided to escape from corporations and do something that inspires me.  Soon I started drawing sketches on a piece of paper of a space that will bring together people like me, to enable us to work and grow together and help each other develop our ideas that would turn into business from which we can live and which we love. Four mounts after that moment, I opened the very first coworking space in Belgrade, a small but cozy Smart Office. I was infected with the coworking virus, and luckily, there is no cure for me! And this virus caught on many of my fellow coworkers, some of whom are growing with me from the first days of Smart Office, others who are returning many times over ad new ones who want to join us. Our current space cannot support our growing community anymore, so we are now in the phase of moving into a bigger space, project we call "Smart Office 2.0".  

WHAT DO WE NEED?

As we are reconstructing and furnishing our new 180 sqm space in Knez Mihailova street, in the heart of Belgrade, there are all sorts of great things needed for the space which require a sufficient budget. We can provide part of the financial resources, but we are relying on community support to help pay for everything we need. Our goal is to collect 5,000 euros! We have to face the crazy expensive world of Belgrade real estate, reconstruction costs, furnishing and office set-up costs, and the money we are raising here will get us closer to the total 10,000 euro budget we need for our project. We have several categories for pledging your donations, so please check them out! Thanks so much to everyone for your support and much needed help! 

WHY DO WE NEED IT?

Our Smart Office is growing bigger and upgrading to Smart Office 2.0 version! We are expanding our  awesome, energized, unique coworking space that Belgrade has never seen before. Help us make an even better home for entrepreneurs and freelance nomads which come to us from all over the world! People have recognized what we do, our passion and energy which we put in Smart Office and now that our community is growing bigger, we need a new home. The new home is double the size of our current space and will enable more opportunities for all activities that our coworkers enjoy and need to succeed. This upgrade is not so easy without the help of people who understand the wider perspective of coworking, its impact on local community and the importance of connectivity of  independent entrepreneurs with peers worldwide. 

We're putting a lot of effort to build a new self-sustaining local community hub – the one which can act as a hub of activity for anyone with an independent disposition, for those who seek a chance to build great things alongside the Belgrade’s best and brightest. Smart Office will continue to be open to all: startups, freelancers, students, artists, digital nomads and all the others who want to work, collaborate, socialize, teach, and learn and an inspiring environment. And to have fun while working, which is veeery important to us! Together we’re building an affordable place for all of them so that they can work happier, be more successful and thrive.

WHAT KIND OF COMMUNITY WE ARE?

Members of Smart Office are bright, hard-working, successful, inspiring people to be around. They come from all types of educational and working backgrounds, from all continents in the world. Most importantly, Smart Office for them is not just a place of work but also a place where they can create and share ideas, collaborate with other coworkers and expand their network and opportunities. At the end of the day, everyone goes home smarter, happier, and more inspired. Smart Office’s new space will be a home to countless events focused on helping people learn to be better entrepreneurs and to connect with others, such as meet-ups, workshops, brainstorming sessions, classes, discussion groups, hackathons, fundraisers, business parties, and more.

When the space opens, which will be very soon, everyone is welcome to this energetic, passionate, idea-jamming dream space: those who are tired of working from home and talking to their pets, for parents refugees, for those who are having meetings in bars and restaurants, or night birds who switched night and day life routine and for many others. All of you should grab a laptop and drop in. No appointment necessary, just stop by, find a spot, say hi to your neighbor, and get your business rollin’!

WHAT ARE OUR PLANS? 

By offering an affordable and flexible place for people to work and host their events, we’re fostering the development of healthy communities of people who share common interests. For us, EDUCATION is also very important. The new space will have a dedicated, expandable classroom for up to 20 people, designed to facilitate community-powered education all the time. We’re developing an educational platform which will connect people who want to teach and share with people who want to learn and discuss.

WHY SHOULD YOU SUPPORT SMART OFFICE?

Belgrade and Serbia are becoming a very healthy start-up ecosystem with a great perspective. People are showing more and more interest and need for coworking.  We also want that the worldwide coworking community grows and to infect as many people as possible with this entrepreneurial virus. We want to be shoulder to shoulder with coworking spaces in Vienna, NY, Berlin, Rome, London, Bangkok… 

One more way you can help is to join the community! Nothing is better than having great people taking part in our community. If you're interested in becoming a Smart Office member, partner or a sponsor, write us a few words here: 

miroslav.mijatov@smartoffice.rs

info@smartoffice.rs

The new space will allow us to partner with organizations who share common interests on special programs and projects. Contact us if you're interested. 

Help make this happen, because Smart Office till now has been an all enthusiast effort, powered by a few persons who care and dream big.  By supporting Smart Office, you are supporting coworking community worldwide. And for us, community is more than business. 

Thank you so much for sharing, caring, liking, posting, donating, supporting, talking, commenting, buzzing, suggesting... It means a lot to us! :)
story_txt:
WHO ARE WE?My name is Miroslav
and I’m the owner and founder of Smart Office, the very first Coworking space in Serbia. I'm also a dreamer who doesn't have much time for sleep, a serial entrepreneur, travel and gastronomad, a guy who can not stay still for one minute. Physically or mentally! It's probably because I'm a Gemini, so of course, for me, it's all about the people. Three and a half years ago, I decided to escape from corporations and do something that inspires me.  Soon I started drawing sketches on a piece of paper of a space that will bring together people like me, to enable us to work and grow together and help each other develop our ideas that would turn into business from which we can live and which we love. Four mounts after that moment, I opened the very first coworking space in Belgrade, a small but cozy Smart Office. I was infected with the coworking virus, and luckily, there is no cure for me! And this virus caught on many of my fellow coworkers, some of whom are growing with me from the first days of Smart Office, others who are returning many times over ad new ones who want to join us. Our current space cannot support our growing community anymore, so we are now in the phase of moving into a bigger space, project we call "Smart Office 2.0".  
WHAT DO WE NEED?As we are reconstructing and furnishing our new 180 sqm space in Knez
Mihailova street, in the heart of Belgrade, there are all sorts of great things
needed for the space which require a sufficient budget. We can provide part of
the financial resources, but we are relying on community support to help
pay for everything we need. Our goal is to collect 5,000 euros! We have to face
the crazy expensive world of Belgrade real estate, reconstruction costs,
furnishing and office set-up costs, and the money we are raising here will get
us closer to the total 10,000 euro budget we need for our project. We have
several categories for pledging your donations, so please check them out! Thanks
so much to everyone for your support and much needed help! 
WHY DO WE NEED IT?Our Smart Office is growing bigger and upgrading to Smart Office 2.0
version! We are expanding our  awesome,
energized, unique coworking space that Belgrade has never seen before. Help us
make an even better home for entrepreneurs and freelance nomads which come to
us from all over the world! People have recognized what we do, our passion
and energy which we put in Smart Office and now that our community is growing
bigger, we need a new home. The new home is double the size of our current
space and will enable more opportunities for all activities that our coworkers
enjoy and need to succeed. This upgrade is not so easy without the help of
people who understand the wider perspective of coworking, its impact on local
community and the importance of connectivity of  independent entrepreneurs with peers worldwide. 
We're putting a lot of effort to build a new self-sustaining local community
hub – the one which can act as a hub of activity for anyone with an independent
disposition, for those who seek a chance to build great things alongside the
Belgrade’s best and brightest. Smart Office will continue to be open to all: startups,
freelancers, students, artists, digital nomads and all the others who want to
work, collaborate, socialize, teach, and learn and an inspiring environment.
And to have fun while working, which is veeery important to us! Together we’re
building an affordable place for all of them so that they can work happier, be
more successful and thrive.
WHAT KIND OF COMMUNITY WE ARE?Members of Smart Office are bright, hard-working, successful, inspiring
people to be around. They come from all types of educational and working
backgrounds, from all continents in the world. Most importantly, Smart Office
for them is not just a place of work but also a place where they can create and
share ideas, collaborate with other coworkers and expand their network and
opportunities. At the end of the day, everyone goes home smarter, happier, and
more inspired. Smart Office’s new space will be a home to countless events
focused on helping people learn to be better entrepreneurs and to connect with
others, such as meet-ups, workshops, brainstorming sessions, classes,
discussion groups, hackathons, fundraisers, business parties, and more.
When the space opens, which will be very soon, everyone is welcome to this energetic,
passionate, idea-jamming dream space: those who are tired of working from home
and talking to their pets, for parents refugees, for those who are having
meetings in bars and restaurants, or night birds who switched night and day
life routine and for many others. All of you should grab a laptop and drop in.
No appointment necessary, just stop by, find a spot, say hi to your neighbor,
and get your business rollin’!
WHAT ARE OUR PLANS? By offering an affordable and flexible place for people to work and host
their events, we’re fostering the development of healthy communities of people
who share common interests. For us, EDUCATION is also very important. The new
space will have a dedicated, expandable classroom for up to 20 people, designed
to facilitate community-powered education all the time. We’re developing an
educational platform which will connect people who want to teach and share with
people who want to learn and discuss.
WHY SHOULD YOU SUPPORT SMART OFFICE?Belgrade and Serbia are becoming a very healthy start-up ecosystem with a
great perspective. People are showing more and more interest and need for coworking. 
We also want that the worldwide coworking community grows and to infect as many
people as possible with this entrepreneurial virus. We want to be shoulder to shoulder
with coworking spaces in Vienna, NY, Berlin, Rome, London, Bangkok… 
One more way you can help is to join the community! Nothing is
better than having great people taking part in our community. If you're
interested in becoming a Smart Office member, partner or a sponsor, write us a
few words here: 
miroslav.mijatov@smartoffice.rs
info@smartoffice.rs
The new space will allow us to partner with organizations who share common
interests on special programs and projects. Contact us if you're
interested. 
Help make this happen, because Smart Office till now has been an all
enthusiast effort, powered by a few persons who care and dream big.  By
supporting Smart Office, you are supporting coworking community worldwide. And
for us, community is more than business. 
Thank you so much for sharing, caring, liking, posting, donating,
supporting, talking, commenting, buzzing, suggesting... It means a lot to us!
:)

story:
Hello,

I am Timothy P Livingston, and together with my wife Stephanie Livingston, we own  a business acquisition and holding company, Horse Creek Holdings, Inc. We are looking to raise capital to help with an impending purchase in order to ensure this company has a smooth transition into the Horse Creek Holdings family. 

At Horse Creek Holdings, Inc. our objective is to acquire established, profit producing businesses in niche markets across the U.S.

 

 

What we need

Break down of funds:

  • $49,000 asking price of the company
  • $11,000 for operational expenses during the transitional phase (rent, utilities, etc.)

 

We will issue interest in the company in the form of stock; 1 share for every $2.00 contributed. What this means for you: you have the opportunity to own a piece of the company, access to shareholder meetings, conference calls, and quarterly financial documents. YOU CAN SHARE IN OUR SUCCESS!  

 

  

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Share on your social media platform
  • If you know someone that could help, have them contact us or give us there information so we can contact them

Thank you for your support! It means a great deal to us!

story:
About Happy Mommy Herbs:

My name is Elecia, I am a Mother, Herbalist, and the creator of Happy Mommy Herbs. This is a 10 year culmination of my life’s work as an herbalist, and where my true passion is held.

My passion ignited when I became pregnant in late 2013, only to find that the knowledge available to Mothers about nourishing our bodies and our growing babies was scarce, and almost non-existent. The only herb I could find widely recommended for pregnancy was Red Raspberry Leaf! While this is an amazing herb in itself for strengthening the uterus, it is definitely not the only herb safe for pregnancy! There are a whole host of tonic herbs that are safe and very needed at this time to nourish our families, and especially our children, who will inherit this beautiful Earth after we depart.

I am the sole owner of this little shop and all the artwork associated with it has been created by me with joy and love. I truly put only the best of the best into these products and into the informational videos and articles on our blog! We must demand the very best, for we are truly at a huge turning point in history, where we can reclaim back our own health and the health of our planet!

What We Need:

In order to start our small company, we need help purchasing the organic herbs and essential oils that we cannot harvest/make ourselves in our home climate.  

In addition to the herbs and essential oils, we would love to purchase our very own herbal distiller to make our own local essential oils from herbs we grow in our garden or harvest in the wild. 


Why do we feel this is so important?

In a recent study by the World Health Organization, the numbers for cancer are skyrocketing. 1 in 2 men will develop cancer within their lifetime and 1 in 3 women will develop cancer in their lifetime. The risk for childhood cancer is 1 in 15! They suggest a link between the introduction of GMO food and toxic environment to the rise in cancer rates. The link between nutrition-deficient, genetically modified food and the spraying of pesticides is now available for all to see. What will we ALL choose to do about this in our own lives?

There truly needs to be a game-changer in the way we nourish pregnancy, post-pregnancy, infants and children. We need safe options we can rely on to strengthen us, enliven us, and give us absolute radiant health in a time of soaring toxicity and destruction of our beloved planet. We believe that the Earth desperately needs people out there who are planting, harvesting, and caring deeply for this wonderful world, and our species desperately needs people out there who are knowledgeable about getting back to what is natural and helping us all to turn our health around so that we remain vibrant and youthful to the end of our days. What we do now is what we plant deep inside for our next generation, and for Mothers, this is very literal!


Happy Mommy Herbs is not only a shop!

This is a vehicle for me to share my knowledge of plants, health, nutrition, recipes, and living in joy with our families. I have created a website FILLED with amazing links to books, documentaries, recipes, and have shared my own personal stories and insights, so that families can gain more wisdom for themselves about their health. I also will soon be posting informational YouTube videos of me sharing knowledge of how to create your own natural herbal products, baby food recipes, wild harvesting herbs, and more. Your support helps me to keep this blog going and growing!


Do you believe in Happy Mommy Herbs?

Do you know a Mother who would love to know more about natural health, but just doesn't know where to start? Perhaps a new Mother who would love to know of amazing, natural baby food recipes, or a way to build back up her strength and stamina after birth? Is your family or a family you know constantly sick? This is why we have created this amazing shop as well as the totally free website and videos for everyone to pass around and share! If you believe in us, please help support our cause!


What You Get:

-Harmony - A Traditional Chinese Medicine Tonic Herb Blend, traditionally used for women's hormone balance, building the blood, and easing painful menstruation. This tea is packed full of nutrients! 

-Joy - A Traditional Chinese Medicine Tonic Herb Blend, traditionally used for pregnant women and everyone else (including men!). This tea was created for emotional well-being and to open the Heart Center to our spirit! It is a beautiful tea that has also been traditionally used to strengthen the immune system and is full of nutrients. 

-Milk Power - A Traditional Chinese Medicine Tonic Herb Blend, traditionally used for post-pregnancy to enhance the nutrients in mother's milk! These herbs are incredibly packed with minerals and nutrition!

-Placenta Preparation - A Traditional Chinese Medicine Tonic Herb Blend, traditionally used for immediate post-pregnancy, for women to brew into a tea with their placenta. Traditionally it has been used to regain the powerful nutrients in the placenta and combined with the herbs to give strength and vitality back to a new mother.

-Mamma's Boost- A Traditional Chinese Medicine Tonic Herb Blend, wild harvested by me and my husband! These herbs have traditionally been used to strengthen the immune system of a pregnant mother and to supply amazing nutrition to a growing baby while in their mother's womb.

-Milk, Please!- A beautiful and tasty blend of organic USA grown herbs specifically for nursing mothers! This tea is so nutritious and has traditionally been used to boost the milk supply mothers need for a growing baby.

-Colic Tamer- A truly amazing blend of organic USA grown herbs, traditionally used for infants to tame colic, and has been used to help infants to sleep peacefully.

-Family Boost - A Traditional Chinese Medicine Tonic Herb Blend, with medicinal mushrooms harvested by me and my husband in the wild! This blend has been traditionally used as a tonic for the entire family and to be taken daily! The herbs included have been used as powerful immune system strengtheners, are full of necessary nutrients and minerals, are used to improve overall health immensely. These herbs also have been used traditionally to open our hearts, and help us live a life in joy!


More Amazing Rewards:

Chaga Glow Face Elixir (a truly luxurious serum for the face that is packed with the highest known sources of antioxidants and botanicals that make your skin stay/become youthful and alive)- Wild harvested chaga mushroom, frankincense essential oil, local organic raw honey, extra virgin organic coconut oil, and orgnanic extra virgin olive oil. 

Sunshine Baby Oil (the most natural and silky smooth baby oil ever)- Organic macadamia nut oil, wild harvested chaga mushroom, chamomile essential oil, and organic extra virgin olive oil. 

Remedy All Herbal Skin Salve (a skin balm with herbs traditionally used for cuts, bruises, rashes, itching, and more)-organic calendula, organic comfrey, organic plantain, organic burdock, organic st. john's wort, organic extra virgin olive oil, local beeswax.

Chaga Lip Balm- wild harvested chaga mushroom, organic calendula, organic comfrey, organic extra virgin olive oil, local beeswax.

Headache Blend (a blend of essential oils that have traditionally been used to drip directly on the head when a headache comes on for immediate relief)- a wonderful blend entirely made out of essential oils, no fillers! Safe for pregnancy.

Cooling Foot Rub (a beautiful blend of herbs and essential oils traditionally used for pain relief and relaxation) - organic calendula, organic arnica, essential oil blend, organic extra virgin olive oil. 

Herb-Dyed Lip Tint (a wonderful balm for the lips and cheeks that is dyed with herbs! The color looks amazing on EVERYONE and is a wonderful replacement to chemical dyed lipstick!)- organic calendula, organic comfrey, organic roses, organic burdock, peppermint essential oil, colored with organic alkanet root and beet root, organic extra virgin olive oil, local beeswax.

+These rewards are just a small handful of products that will be available in the shop!!!


Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that not everyone is able to contribute, but if you believe in helping us to make a change to make a healthy lifestyle easier for families, there are some ways you can still help!

  • Please feel free to share this link through your social media such as facebook, twitter, etc.!
  • Share the Happy Mommy Herbs Blog with friends and family!


Many thanks and much love and blessings to all of you on your journey of life!

story:
Short Summary

Hello, and thank you for taking the time to read about our crowdfunding campaign to open up a nightclub/restaurant in Santa Clarita, California. Los Angeles has established an exciting and vibrant nightclub scene that fully embraced and captured entertainment that young people can go to enjoy themselves and have a good time.

Santa Clarita doesn't have any real nightlife that compares to the exciting and entertaining LA scene. As a matter of fact, there are nearly NO nightspots where they even have dancing at all!  We have one location that opens a back room to their restaurant on Friday and Saturday nights. It’s small, dirty and the people they allow in, frankly, make young adults, especially women, feel unsafe.

We are trying to open a modern, high-tech Nightclub and Restaurant in Santa Clarita. With no entertainment dance clubs for the over 40,000 young adults here, it is a nightlife desert where we have to travel elsewhere to find fun things to do. In most cases, we have to drive up to 40 miles to some pretty seedy areas of Los Angeles to go dancing and this is not only inconvenient for many of us, but it would be safer to have a decent night club here in Santa Clarita. Most don't bother or risk diving late at night out of the area. More importantly, many of our sisters, brothers, family and friends are either leaving to find work elsewhere or not returning when they graduate college because there is nothing for them to do here in their off-hours! 

What We Need & What You Get

           We're looking for $150,000 to start our nightclub in Santa Clarita. We are looking for funding for startup financing that will be needed to get our nightclub started, coordinating with the Santa Clarita zoning board with finding a location for our nightclub, funds for leasing or renting our nightclub location, obtaining a food and liquor license, hiring managers and employees, marketing and advertising and other expenses associated with opening up a nightclub and restaurant. With the help of a business consultant with over 40 years’ experience in startups and business management, we have already completed our entire our business plan, including a 3 year income projection, and the schedule to implement it. If we don't reach our goal we will implement the steps one at a time as we continue to fund raise.

Here are the great perks we are offering:

$10 – 1 Free admittance

$50 – i5 T-Shirt plus 1 free admittance

$100 – Free admittance for you and 3 friends plus 4 i5 T-Shirts

$500 – 1 Year VIP Membership that includes no cover charge and no waiting in line for a full year! 

$1000 – 1 Year VIP Membership for 2 people that includes no cover charge and no waiting in line for a full year plus 2 i5 T-Shirts and a $100 gift certificate for food and beverage! 

$10,000 – 3 Year VIP Membership and YOUR OWN PRIVATE PARTY FOR UP TO 50 GUESTS! On a Sunday, Monday or Tuesday night (alcohol not included) Contact us for details at info@i5nightclub.com.


The Impact

In Santa Clarita, we have two local colleges with over 24,000 students in our area with no place to have fun. If we are able to raise enough funds to open up a new nightclub in our area, then young people in Santa Clarita would not have to travel very far to find something to do. This would also help promote safe and vibrant activity in support of Santa Clarita's social experience in the community as well by keeping the entertainment dollars local. This club will have all the high tech features of a fancy LA Downtown clubs with high quality audio systems and lights including lasers.

Whether there’s an EDM DJ performing or we’re having a retro night of disco, we will be prepared to dress the part and give people the same sort of high-quality experience they would expect if they were driving into the city.

  In addition to benefiting the youth, our club (tentatively called i5) will benefit the community of Santa Clarita by keeping revenue and tax dollars in the area. There is no good reason for us to send off our own citizens every weekend, their pockets filled, to Los Angeles. They could get the same experience here at home, and our schools and public services could use the money they spend to continue to make the town bigger and better. This is a win for everyone, but mainly, we don’t want to lose our family and friends!

     With your support, your positive contributions that you can offer to our businesses will help the nightlife in Santa Clarita area and provide a fun and exciting place for students and young people alike to go to instead of having to travel to Los Angeles. Please help us keep our friends at home!

Risks & Challenges

      While starting a nightclub sounds like fun, it is also hard work. There are, generally, several challenges to opening a dance club.  Between personnel, supplies and location costs; it is expensive to open a nightclub.  The most challenging have to do with dealing with the city. Knowing that, we have already found and spoken to all of the applicable departments of Santa Clarita and lined up what permits we need and what the city requires as to how we operate the business. We have already contacted the suppliers and distributors of our necessary supplies and equipment as well as the location we want. Our comprehensive business plan addresses all of the supply costs and operating expenses we will be facing and how to manage them profitably.
     We know exactly how we want our business to be run and what kind of clientele we are trying to appeal to, but we need your help to get started and make our vision a reality.

      With your support and generous contributions, we can help bring the nightclub scene to Santa Clarita and improve the quality entertainment that is offered in our area for our young people. Help spread the word to support creative and financial vitality in Santa Clarita's social experience for visitors and residents.

Thank you in advance for your help!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can’t make a contribution at this time, we completely understand but there are still ways you can help us with our Santa Clarita nightclub and restaurant. Please take a few moments and share our story and this crowdfunding campaign with your friends and family via social media, email, and through word of mouth or Indigogo's share tools!
